*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_forms_get_type ()))))
)),
2397 field,
2398 GPOINTER_TO_INT (l->data)((gint) (glong) (l->data)));
2399 }
2400 }
2401 field->changed = FALSE(0);
2402 ev_view_reload_page (view, field->page->index, field_region);
2403 cairo_region_destroy (field_region);
2404 }
2405}
2406
2407static void
2408ev_view_form_field_choice_changed (GtkWidget *widget,
2409 EvFormField *field)
2410{
2411 EvFormFieldChoice *field_choice = EV_FORM_FIELD_CHOICE (field)((((EvFormFieldChoice*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((field)), ((ev_form_field_choice_get_type()))))));
2412
2413 if (GTK_IS_COMBO_BOX (widget)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(widget)); GType __t = ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
2414 gint item;
2415
2416 item = gtk_combo_box_get_active (GTK_COMBO_BOX (widget)((((GtkComboBox*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((widget)), ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())))))));
2417 if (!field_choice->selected_items ||
2418 GPOINTER_TO_INT (field_choice->selected_items->data)((gint) (glong) (field_choice->selected_items->data)) != item) {
2419 g_list_free (field_choice->selected_items);
2420 field_choice->selected_items = NULL((void*)0);
2421 field_choice->selected_items = g_list_prepend (field_choice->selected_items,
2422 GINT_TO_POINTER (item)((gpointer) (glong) (item)));
2423 field->changed = TRUE(!(0));
2424 }
2425
2426 if (gtk_combo_box_get_has_entry (GTK_COMBO_BOX (widget)((((GtkComboBox*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((widget)), ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())))))))) {
2427 const gchar *text;
2428
2429 text = gtk_entry_get_text (GTK_ENTRY (gtk_bin_get_child (GTK_BIN (widget)))((((GtkEntry*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(gtk_bin_get_child (((((GtkBin*) g_type_check_instance_cast (
(GTypeInstance*) ((widget)), ((gtk_bin_get_type ()))))))))), (
(gtk_entry_get_type ())))))));
2430 if (!field_choice->text ||
2431 (field_choice->text && g_ascii_strcasecmp (field_choice->text, text) != 0)) {
2432 g_free (field_choice->text);
2433 field_choice->text = g_strdup(text);
2434 field->changed = TRUE(!(0));
2435 }
2436 }
2437 } else if (GTK_IS_TREE_SELECTION (widget)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(widget)); GType __t = ((gtk_tree_selection_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
2438 GtkTreeSelection *selection = GTK_TREE_SELECTION (widget)((((GtkTreeSelection*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((widget)), ((gtk_tree_selection_get_type ()))))));
2439 GtkTreeModel *model;
2440 GList *items, *l;
2441
2442 items = gtk_tree_selection_get_selected_rows (selection, &model);
2443 g_list_free (field_choice->selected_items);
2444 field_choice->selected_items = NULL((void*)0);
2445
2446 for (l = items; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
2447 GtkTreeIter iter;
2448 GtkTreePath *path = (GtkTreePath *)l->data;
2449 gint item;
2450
2451 gtk_tree_model_get_iter (model, &iter, path);
2452 gtk_tree_model_get (model, &iter, 1, &item, -1);
2453
2454 field_choice->selected_items = g_list_prepend (field_choice->selected_items,
2455 GINT_TO_POINTER (item)((gpointer) (glong) (item)));
2456
2457 gtk_tree_path_free (path);
2458 }
2459
2460 g_list_free (items);
2461
2462 field->changed = TRUE(!(0));
2463 }
2464}
2465
2466static GtkWidget *
2467ev_view_form_field_choice_create_widget (EvView *view,
2468 EvFormField *field)
2469{
2470 EvFormFieldChoice *field_choice = EV_FORM_FIELD_CHOICE (field)((((EvFormFieldChoice*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((field)), ((ev_form_field_choice_get_type()))))));
2471 GtkWidget *choice;
2472 GtkTreeModel *model;
2473 gint n_items, i;
2474 gint selected_item = 0;
2475
2476 n_items = ev_document_forms_form_field_choice_get_n_items (EV_DOCUMENT_FORMS (view->document)((((EvDocumentForms*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_forms_get_type ()))))
)),
2477 field);
2478 model = GTK_TREE_MODEL (gtk_list_store_new (2, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_INT))((((GtkTreeModel*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((gtk_list_store_new (2, ((GType) ((16) << (2))), ((
GType) ((6) << (2)))))), ((gtk_tree_model_get_type ()))
))));
2479 for (i = 0; i < n_items; i++) {
2480 GtkTreeIter iter;
2481 gchar *item;
2482
2483 item = ev_document_forms_form_field_choice_get_item (EV_DOCUMENT_FORMS (view->document)((((EvDocumentForms*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_forms_get_type ()))))
)),
2484 field, i);
2485 if (ev_document_forms_form_field_choice_is_item_selected (
2486 EV_DOCUMENT_FORMS (view->document)((((EvDocumentForms*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_forms_get_type ()))))
)), field, i)) {
2487 selected_item = i;
2488 /* FIXME: we need a get_selected_items function in poppler */
2489 field_choice->selected_items = g_list_prepend (field_choice->selected_items,
2490 GINT_TO_POINTER (i)((gpointer) (glong) (i)));
2491 }
2492
2493 if (item) {
2494 gtk_list_store_append (GTK_LIST_STORE (model)((((GtkListStore*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((model)), ((gtk_list_store_get_type ())))))), &iter);
2495 gtk_list_store_set (GTK_LIST_STORE (model)((((GtkListStore*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((model)), ((gtk_list_store_get_type ())))))), &iter,
2496 0, item,
2497 1, i,
2498 -1);
2499 g_free (item);
2500 }
2501 }
2502
2503 if (field_choice->type == EV_FORM_FIELD_CHOICE_LIST) {
2504 GtkCellRenderer *renderer;
2505 GtkWidget *tree_view;
2506 GtkTreeSelection *selection;
2507
2508 tree_view = gtk_tree_view_new_with_model (model);
2509 gtk_tree_view_set_headers_visible (GTK_TREE_VIEW (tree_view)((((GtkTreeView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((tree_view)), ((gtk_tree_view_get_type ())))))), FALSE(0));
2510
2511 selection = gtk_tree_view_get_selection (GTK_TREE_VIEW (tree_view)((((GtkTreeView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((tree_view)), ((gtk_tree_view_get_type ())))))));
2512 if (field_choice->multi_select) {
2513 gtk_tree_selection_set_mode (selection, GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE);
2514 }
2515
2516 /* TODO: set selected items */
2517
2518 renderer = gtk_cell_renderer_text_new ();
2519 gtk_tree_view_insert_column_with_attributes (GTK_TREE_VIEW (tree_view)((((GtkTreeView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((tree_view)), ((gtk_tree_view_get_type ())))))),
2520 0,
2521 "choix", renderer,
2522 "text", 0,
2523 NULL((void*)0));
2524
2525 choice = gtk_scrolled_window_new (NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
2526 gtk_scrolled_window_set_policy (GTK_SCROLLED_WINDOW (choice)((((GtkScrolledWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((choice)), ((gtk_scrolled_window_get_type ())))))),
2527 GTK_POLICY_AUTOMATIC,
2528 GTK_POLICY_AUTOMATIC);
2529 gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (choice)((((GtkContainer*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((choice)), ((gtk_container_get_type ())))))), tree_view);
2530 gtk_widget_show (tree_view);
2531
2532 g_signal_connect (selection, "changed",g_signal_connect_data ((selection), ("changed"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0),
(GConnectFlags) 0)
2533 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_choice_changed),g_signal_connect_data ((selection), ("changed"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0),
(GConnectFlags) 0)
2534 field)g_signal_connect_data ((selection), ("changed"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0),
(GConnectFlags) 0);
2535 g_signal_connect_after (selection, "changed",g_signal_connect_data ((selection), ("changed"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER
)
2536 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_destroy),g_signal_connect_data ((selection), ("changed"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER
)
2537 view)g_signal_connect_data ((selection), ("changed"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER
);
2538 } else if (field_choice->is_editable) { /* ComboBoxEntry */
2539 gchar *text;
2540
2541 choice = gtk_combo_box_new_with_model_and_entry (model);
2542 gtk_combo_box_set_entry_text_column (GTK_COMBO_BOX (choice)((((GtkComboBox*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((choice)), ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())))))), 0);
2543 text = ev_document_forms_form_field_choice_get_text (EV_DOCUMENT_FORMS (view->document)((((EvDocumentForms*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_forms_get_type ()))))
)), field);
2544 if (text) {
2545 gtk_entry_set_text (GTK_ENTRY (gtk_bin_get_child (GTK_BIN (choice)))((((GtkEntry*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(gtk_bin_get_child (((((GtkBin*) g_type_check_instance_cast (
(GTypeInstance*) ((choice)), ((gtk_bin_get_type ()))))))))), (
(gtk_entry_get_type ())))))), text);
2546 g_free (text);
2547 }
2548
2549 g_signal_connect (choice, "changed",g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
2550 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_choice_changed),g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
2551 field)g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
2552 g_signal_connect_after (gtk_bin_get_child (GTK_BIN (choice)),g_signal_connect_data ((gtk_bin_get_child (((((GtkBin*) g_type_check_instance_cast
((GTypeInstance*) ((choice)), ((gtk_bin_get_type ())))))))),
("activate"), (((GCallback) (ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (
view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER)
2553 "activate",g_signal_connect_data ((gtk_bin_get_child (((((GtkBin*) g_type_check_instance_cast
((GTypeInstance*) ((choice)), ((gtk_bin_get_type ())))))))),
("activate"), (((GCallback) (ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (
view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER)
2554 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_destroy),g_signal_connect_data ((gtk_bin_get_child (((((GtkBin*) g_type_check_instance_cast
((GTypeInstance*) ((choice)), ((gtk_bin_get_type ())))))))),
("activate"), (((GCallback) (ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (
view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER)
2555 view)g_signal_connect_data ((gtk_bin_get_child (((((GtkBin*) g_type_check_instance_cast
((GTypeInstance*) ((choice)), ((gtk_bin_get_type ())))))))),
("activate"), (((GCallback) (ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (
view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER);
2556 } else { /* ComboBoxText */
2557 GtkCellRenderer *renderer;
2558
2559 choice = gtk_combo_box_new_with_model (model);
2560 renderer = gtk_cell_renderer_text_new ();
2561 gtk_cell_layout_pack_start (GTK_CELL_LAYOUT (choice)((((GtkCellLayout*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((choice)), ((gtk_cell_layout_get_type ())))))),
2562 renderer, TRUE(!(0)));
2563 gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes (GTK_CELL_LAYOUT (choice)((((GtkCellLayout*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((choice)), ((gtk_cell_layout_get_type ())))))),
2564 renderer,
2565 "text", 0,
2566 NULL((void*)0));
2567 gtk_combo_box_set_active (GTK_COMBO_BOX (choice)((((GtkComboBox*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((choice)), ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())))))), selected_item);
2568 gtk_combo_box_popup (GTK_COMBO_BOX (choice)((((GtkComboBox*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((choice)), ((gtk_combo_box_get_type ())))))));
2569
2570 g_signal_connect (choice, "changed",g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
2571 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_choice_changed),g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
2572 field)g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_choice_changed))), (field), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
2573 g_signal_connect_after (choice, "changed",g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER
)
2574 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_destroy),g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER
)
2575 view)g_signal_connect_data ((choice), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (
ev_view_form_field_destroy))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_AFTER
);
2576 }
2577
2578 g_object_unref (model);
2579
2580 g_object_weak_ref (G_OBJECT (choice)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
choice)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))),
2581 (GWeakNotify)ev_view_form_field_choice_save,
2582 view);
2583
2584 return choice;
2585}
2586
2587void
2588_ev_view_focus_form_field (EvView *view,
2589 EvFormField *field)
2590{
2591 GtkWidget *field_widget = NULL((void*)0);
2592 EvMappingList *form_field_mapping;
2593 EvMapping *mapping;
2594
2595 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, NULL((void*)0), -1);
2596
2597 if (field->is_read_only)
2598 return;
2599
2600 if (EV_IS_FORM_FIELD_BUTTON (field)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(field)); GType __t = ((ev_form_field_button_get_type())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
2601 field_widget = ev_view_form_field_button_create_widget (view, field);
2602 } else if (EV_IS_FORM_FIELD_TEXT (field)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(field)); GType __t = ((ev_form_field_text_get_type())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
2603 field_widget = ev_view_form_field_text_create_widget (view, field);
2604 } else if (EV_IS_FORM_FIELD_CHOICE (field)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(field)); GType __t = ((ev_form_field_choice_get_type())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
2605 field_widget = ev_view_form_field_choice_create_widget (view, field);
2606 } else if (EV_IS_FORM_FIELD_SIGNATURE (field)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(field)); GType __t = ((ev_form_field_signature_get_type()));
gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) {
2607 /* TODO */
2608 }
2609
2610 /* Form field doesn't require a widget */
2611 if (!field_widget)
2612 return;
2613
2614 g_object_set_data_full (G_OBJECT (field_widget)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
field_widget)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), "form-field",
2615 g_object_ref (field),
2616 (GDestroyNotify)g_object_unref);
2617
2618 form_field_mapping = ev_page_cache_get_form_field_mapping (view->page_cache,
2619 field->page->index);
2620 mapping = ev_mapping_list_find (form_field_mapping, field);
2621 ev_view_put_to_doc_rect (view, field_widget, field->page->index, &mapping->area);
2622 gtk_widget_show (field_widget);
2623 gtk_widget_grab_focus (field_widget);
2624}
2625
2626static void
2627ev_view_handle_form_field (EvView *view,
2628 EvFormField *field)
2629{
2630 if (field->is_read_only)
2631 return;
2632
2633 _ev_view_focus_form_field (view, field);
2634
2635 if (field->activation_link)
2636 ev_view_handle_link (view, field->activation_link);
2637
2638 if (EV_IS_FORM_FIELD_BUTTON (field)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(field)); GType __t = ((ev_form_field_button_get_type())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))))
2639 ev_view_form_field_button_toggle (view, field);
2640
2641}
2642
2643/* Annotations */
2644static EvViewWindowChild *
2645ev_view_get_window_child (EvView *view,
2646 GtkWidget *window)
2647{
2648 GList *children = view->window_children;
2649
2650 while (children) {
2651 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2652
2653 child = (EvViewWindowChild *)children->data;
2654 children = children->next;
2655
2656 if (child->window == window)
2657 return child;
2658 }
2659
2660 return NULL((void*)0);
2661}
2662
2663static void
2664ev_view_window_child_move (EvView *view,
2665 EvViewWindowChild *child,
2666 gint x,
2667 gint y)
2668{
2669 GtkAllocation allocation;
2670 gint width, height;
2671
2672 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &allocation);
2673 gtk_window_get_size (GTK_WINDOW (child->window)((((GtkWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(child->window)), ((gtk_window_get_type ())))))), &width, &height);
2674
2675 child->x = x;
2676 child->y = y;
2677 gtk_window_move (GTK_WINDOW (child->window)((((GtkWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(child->window)), ((gtk_window_get_type ())))))),
2678 CLAMP (x, child->parent_x,(((x) > (child->parent_x + allocation.width - width)) ?
(child->parent_x + allocation.width - width) : (((x) <
(child->parent_x)) ? (child->parent_x) : (x)))
2679 child->parent_x + allocation.width - width)(((x) > (child->parent_x + allocation.width - width)) ?
(child->parent_x + allocation.width - width) : (((x) <
(child->parent_x)) ? (child->parent_x) : (x))),
2680 CLAMP (y, child->parent_y,(((y) > (child->parent_y + allocation.height - height))
? (child->parent_y + allocation.height - height) : (((y) <
(child->parent_y)) ? (child->parent_y) : (y)))
2681 child->parent_y + allocation.height - height)(((y) > (child->parent_y + allocation.height - height))
? (child->parent_y + allocation.height - height) : (((y) <
(child->parent_y)) ? (child->parent_y) : (y))));
2682}
2683
2684static void
2685ev_view_window_child_move_with_parent (EvView *view,
2686 GtkWidget *window)
2687{
2688 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2689 gint root_x, root_y;
2690
2691 child = ev_view_get_window_child (view, window);
2692 gdk_window_get_origin (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
2693 &root_x, &root_y);
2694 if (root_x != child->parent_x || root_y != child->parent_y) {
2695 gint dest_x, dest_y;
2696
2697 dest_x = child->x + (root_x - child->parent_x);
2698 dest_y = child->y + (root_y - child->parent_y);
2699 child->parent_x = root_x;
2700 child->parent_y = root_y;
2701 ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, dest_x, dest_y);
2702 }
2703
2704 if (child->visible && !gtk_widget_get_visible (window))
2705 gtk_widget_show (window);
2706}
2707
2708static void
2709ev_view_window_child_put (EvView *view,
2710 GtkWidget *window,
2711 guint page,
2712 gint x,
2713 gint y,
2714 gdouble orig_x,
2715 gdouble orig_y)
2716{
2717 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2718 gint root_x, root_y;
2719
2720 gdk_window_get_origin (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
2721 &root_x, &root_y);
2722
2723 child = g_new0 (EvViewWindowChild, 1)(EvViewWindowChild *) (__extension__ ({ gsize __n = (gsize) (
1); gsize __s = sizeof (EvViewWindowChild); gpointer __p; if (
__s == 1) __p = g_malloc0 (__n); else if (__builtin_constant_p
(__n) && (__s == 0 || __n <= (9223372036854775807L
*2UL+1UL) / __s)) __p = g_malloc0 (__n * __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n
(__n, __s); __p; }));
2724 child->window = window;
2725 child->page = page;
2726 child->orig_x = orig_x;
2727 child->orig_y = orig_y;
2728 child->parent_x = root_x;
2729 child->parent_y = root_y;
2730 child->visible = ev_annotation_window_is_open (EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (window)((((EvAnnotationWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((window)), ((ev_annotation_window_get_type())))))));
2731 ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, x + root_x, y + root_y);
2732
2733 if (child->visible)
2734 gtk_widget_show (window);
2735 else
2736 gtk_widget_hide (window);
2737
2738 view->window_children = g_list_append (view->window_children, child);
2739}
2740
2741static EvViewWindowChild *
2742ev_view_find_window_child_for_annot (EvView *view,
2743 guint page,
2744 EvAnnotation *annot)
2745{
2746 GList *children = view->window_children;
2747
2748 while (children) {
2749 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2750 EvAnnotation *wannot;
2751
2752 child = (EvViewWindowChild *)children->data;
2753 children = children->next;
2754
2755 if (child->page != page)
2756 continue;
2757
2758 wannot = ev_annotation_window_get_annotation (EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (child->window)((((EvAnnotationWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((child->window)), ((ev_annotation_window_get_type())))
))));
2759 if (ev_annotation_equal (wannot, annot))
2760 return child;
2761 }
2762
2763 return NULL((void*)0);
2764}
2765
2766static void
2767ev_view_window_children_free (EvView *view)
2768{
2769 GList *l;
2770
2771 if (!view->window_children)
2772 return;
2773
2774 for (l = view->window_children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
2775 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2776
2777 child = (EvViewWindowChild *)l->data;
2778 gtk_widget_destroy (GTK_WIDGET (child->window)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(child->window)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
2779 g_free (child);
2780 }
2781 g_list_free (view->window_children);
2782 view->window_children = NULL((void*)0);
2783 view->window_child_focus = NULL((void*)0);
2784}
2785
2786static void
2787annotation_window_grab_focus (GtkWidget *widget,
2788 EvView *view)
2789{
2790 if (view->window_child_focus)
2791 ev_annotation_window_ungrab_focus (EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (view->window_child_focus->window)((((EvAnnotationWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->window_child_focus->window)), ((ev_annotation_window_get_type
())))))));
2792 view->window_child_focus = ev_view_get_window_child (view, widget);
2793}
2794
2795static void
2796annotation_window_closed (EvAnnotationWindow *window,
2797 EvView *view)
2798{
2799 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2800
2801 child = ev_view_get_window_child (view, GTK_WIDGET (window)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(window)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
2802 child->visible = FALSE(0);
2803}
2804
2805static void
2806annotation_window_moved (EvAnnotationWindow *window,
2807 gint x,
2808 gint y,
2809 EvView *view)
2810{
2811 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2812 GdkRectangle page_area;
2813 GtkBorder border;
2814 GdkRectangle view_rect;
2815 EvRectangle doc_rect;
2816 gint width, height;
2817
2818 child = ev_view_get_window_child (view, GTK_WIDGET (window)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(window)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
2819 if (child->x == x && child->y == y)
2820 return;
2821
2822 child->moved = TRUE(!(0));
2823 child->x = x;
2824 child->y = y;
2825
2826 /* Window has been moved by the user,
2827 * we have to set a new origin in doc coords
2828 */
2829 gtk_window_get_size (GTK_WINDOW (window)((((GtkWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(window)), ((gtk_window_get_type ())))))), &width, &height);
2830 view_rect.x = (x - child->parent_x) + view->scroll_x;
2831 view_rect.y = (y - child->parent_y) + view->scroll_y;
2832 view_rect.width = width;
2833 view_rect.height = height;
2834
2835 ev_view_get_page_extents (view, child->page, &page_area, &border);
2836 _ev_view_transform_view_rect_to_doc_rect (view, &view_rect, &page_area, &doc_rect);
2837 child->orig_x = doc_rect.x1;
2838 child->orig_y = doc_rect.y1;
2839}
2840
2841static void
2842ev_view_annotation_save_contents (EvView *view,
2843 GParamSpec *pspec,
2844 EvAnnotation *annot)
2845{
2846 if (!view->document)
2847 return;
2848
2849 ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
2850 ev_document_annotations_save_annotation (EV_DOCUMENT_ANNOTATIONS (view->document)((((EvDocumentAnnotations*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_annotations_get_type (
))))))),
2851 annot, EV_ANNOTATIONS_SAVE_CONTENTS);
2852 ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
2853}
2854
2855static GtkWidget *
2856ev_view_create_annotation_window (EvView *view,
2857 EvAnnotation *annot,
2858 GtkWindow *parent)
2859{
2860 GtkWidget *window;
2861 EvRectangle doc_rect;
2862 GdkRectangle view_rect;
2863 guint page;
2864
2865 window = ev_annotation_window_new (annot, parent);
2866 g_signal_connect (window, "grab_focus",g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("grab_focus"), (((GCallback
) (annotation_window_grab_focus))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
2867 G_CALLBACK (annotation_window_grab_focus),g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("grab_focus"), (((GCallback
) (annotation_window_grab_focus))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
2868 view)g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("grab_focus"), (((GCallback
) (annotation_window_grab_focus))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
2869 g_signal_connect (window, "closed",g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("closed"), (((GCallback) (annotation_window_closed
))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
2870 G_CALLBACK (annotation_window_closed),g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("closed"), (((GCallback) (annotation_window_closed
))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
2871 view)g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("closed"), (((GCallback) (annotation_window_closed
))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
2872 g_signal_connect (window, "moved",g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("moved"), (((GCallback) (annotation_window_moved
))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
2873 G_CALLBACK (annotation_window_moved),g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("moved"), (((GCallback) (annotation_window_moved
))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
2874 view)g_signal_connect_data ((window), ("moved"), (((GCallback) (annotation_window_moved
))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
2875 g_signal_connect_swapped (annot, "notify::contents",g_signal_connect_data ((annot), ("notify::contents"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_annotation_save_contents))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED
)
2876 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_annotation_save_contents),g_signal_connect_data ((annot), ("notify::contents"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_annotation_save_contents))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED
)
2877 view)g_signal_connect_data ((annot), ("notify::contents"), (((GCallback
) (ev_view_annotation_save_contents))), (view), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED
);
2878 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (annot)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
annot)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), "popup", window);
2879
2880 page = ev_annotation_get_page_index (annot);
2881 ev_annotation_window_get_rectangle (EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (window)((((EvAnnotationWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((window)), ((ev_annotation_window_get_type())))))), &doc_rect);
2882 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, &doc_rect, &view_rect);
2883 view_rect.x -= view->scroll_x;
2884 view_rect.y -= view->scroll_y;
2885
2886 ev_view_window_child_put (view, window, page,
2887 view_rect.x, view_rect.y,
2888 doc_rect.x1, doc_rect.y1);
2889
2890 return window;
2891}
2892
2893static void
2894show_annotation_windows (EvView *view,
2895 gint page)
2896{
2897 EvMappingList *annots;
2898 GList *l;
2899 GtkWindow *parent;
2900
2901 parent = GTK_WINDOW (gtk_widget_get_toplevel (GTK_WIDGET (view)))((((GtkWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(gtk_widget_get_toplevel (((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast
((GTypeInstance*) ((view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))))
), ((gtk_window_get_type ()))))));
2902
2903 annots = ev_page_cache_get_annot_mapping (view->page_cache, page);
2904
2905 for (l = ev_mapping_list_get_list (annots); l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
2906 EvAnnotation *annot;
2907 EvViewWindowChild *child;
2908 GtkWidget *window;
2909
2910 annot = ((EvMapping *)(l->data))->data;
2911
2912 if (!EV_IS_ANNOTATION_MARKUP (annot)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_markup_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))))
2913 continue;
2914
2915 if (!ev_annotation_markup_has_popup (EV_ANNOTATION_MARKUP (annot)((((EvAnnotationMarkup*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((annot)), ((ev_annotation_markup_get_type ()))))))))
2916 continue;
2917
2918 window = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (annot)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
annot)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), "popup");
2919 if (window) {
2920 ev_view_window_child_move_with_parent (view, window);
2921 continue;
2922 }
2923
2924 /* Look if we already have a popup for this annot */
2925 child = ev_view_find_window_child_for_annot (view, page, annot);
2926 window = child ? child->window : NULL((void*)0);
2927 if (window) {
2928 ev_annotation_window_set_annotation (EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (window)((((EvAnnotationWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((window)), ((ev_annotation_window_get_type())))))), annot);
2929 g_object_set_data (G_OBJECT (annot)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
annot)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), "popup", window);
2930 ev_view_window_child_move_with_parent (view, window);
2931 } else {
2932 ev_view_create_annotation_window (view, annot, parent);
2933 }
2934 }
2935}
2936
2937static void
2938hide_annotation_windows (EvView *view,
2939 gint page)
2940{
2941 EvMappingList *annots;
2942 GList *l;
2943
2944 annots = ev_page_cache_get_annot_mapping (view->page_cache, page);
2945
2946 for (l = ev_mapping_list_get_list (annots); l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
2947 EvAnnotation *annot;
2948 GtkWidget *window;
2949
2950 annot = ((EvMapping *)(l->data))->data;
2951
2952 if (!EV_IS_ANNOTATION_MARKUP (annot)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_markup_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))))
2953 continue;
2954
2955 window = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (annot)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
annot)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), "popup");
2956 if (window)
2957 gtk_widget_hide (window);
2958 }
2959}
2960
2961static EvMapping *
2962get_annotation_mapping_at_location (EvView *view,
2963 gdouble x,
2964 gdouble y,
2965 gint *page)
2966{
2967 gint x_new = 0, y_new = 0;
2968 EvMappingList *annotations_mapping;
2969
2970 if (!EV_IS_DOCUMENT_ANNOTATIONS (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_document_annotations_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))))
2971 return NULL((void*)0);
2972
2973 if (!get_doc_point_from_location (view, x, y, page, &x_new, &y_new))
2974 return NULL((void*)0);
2975
2976 annotations_mapping = ev_page_cache_get_annot_mapping (view->page_cache, *page);
2977
2978 if (annotations_mapping)
2979 return ev_mapping_list_get (annotations_mapping, x_new, y_new);
2980
2981 return NULL((void*)0);
2982}
2983
2984static EvAnnotation *
2985ev_view_get_annotation_at_location (EvView *view,
2986 gdouble x,
2987 gdouble y)
2988{
2989 EvMapping *annotation_mapping;
2990 gint page;
2991
2992 annotation_mapping = get_annotation_mapping_at_location (view, x, y, &page);
2993
2994 return annotation_mapping ? annotation_mapping->data : NULL((void*)0);
2995}
2996
2997static void
2998ev_view_annotation_show_popup_window (EvView *view,
2999 GtkWidget *window)
3000{
3001 EvViewWindowChild *child;
3002
3003 if (!window)
3004 return;
3005
3006 child = ev_view_get_window_child (view, window);
3007 if (!child->visible) {
3008 child->visible = TRUE(!(0));
3009 ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, child->x, child->y);
3010 gtk_widget_show (window);
3011 }
3012}
3013
3014static void
3015ev_view_handle_annotation (EvView *view,
3016 EvAnnotation *annot,
3017 gdouble x,
3018 gdouble y,
3019 guint32 timestamp)
3020{
3021 if (EV_IS_ANNOTATION_MARKUP (annot)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_markup_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
3022 GtkWidget *window;
3023
3024 window = g_object_get_data (G_OBJECT (annot)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
annot)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), "popup");
3025 ev_view_annotation_show_popup_window (view, window);
3026 }
3027
3028 if (EV_IS_ANNOTATION_ATTACHMENT (annot)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_attachment_get_type()))
; gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class
&& __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)
); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }
))))) {
3029 EvAttachment *attachment;
3030
3031 attachment = ev_annotation_attachment_get_attachment (EV_ANNOTATION_ATTACHMENT (annot)((((EvAnnotationAttachment*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((annot)), ((ev_annotation_attachment_get_type())))))));
3032 if (attachment) {
3033 GError *error = NULL((void*)0);
3034
3035 ev_attachment_open (attachment,
3036 gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
3037 timestamp,
3038 &error);
3039
3040 if (error) {
3041 g_warning ("%s", error->message);
3042 g_error_free (error);
3043 }
3044 }
3045 }
3046}
3047
3048static void
3049ev_view_create_annotation (EvView *view,
3050 EvAnnotationType annot_type,
3051 gint x,
3052 gint y)
3053{
3054 EvAnnotation *annot;
3055 GdkPoint point;
3056 GdkRectangle page_area;
3057 GtkBorder border;
3058 EvRectangle doc_rect, popup_rect;
3059 EvPage *page;
3060 GdkColor color = { 0, 65535, 65535, 0 };
3061 GdkRectangle view_rect;
3062 cairo_region_t *region;
3063
3064 point.x = x;
3065 point.y = y;
3066 ev_view_get_page_extents (view, view->current_page, &page_area, &border);
3067 _ev_view_transform_view_point_to_doc_point (view, &point, &page_area,
3068 &doc_rect.x1, &doc_rect.y1);
3069 doc_rect.x2 = doc_rect.x1 + 24;
3070 doc_rect.y2 = doc_rect.y1 + 24;
3071
3072 ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
3073 page = ev_document_get_page (view->document, view->current_page);
3074 switch (annot_type) {
3075 case EV_ANNOTATION_TYPE_TEXT:
3076 annot = ev_annotation_text_new (page);
3077 break;
3078 case EV_ANNOTATION_TYPE_ATTACHMENT:
3079 /* TODO */
3080 g_object_unref (page);
3081 ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
3082 return;
3083 default:
3084 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 3084
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
3085 }
3086 g_object_unref (page);
3087
3088 ev_annotation_set_color (annot, &color);
3089
3090 if (EV_IS_ANNOTATION_MARKUP (annot)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_markup_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
3091 popup_rect.x1 = doc_rect.x2;
3092 popup_rect.x2 = popup_rect.x1 + 200;
3093 popup_rect.y1 = doc_rect.y2;
3094 popup_rect.y2 = popup_rect.y1 + 150;
3095 g_object_set (annot,
3096 "rectangle", &popup_rect,
3097 "has_popup", TRUE(!(0)),
3098 "popup_is_open", FALSE(0),
3099 "label", g_get_real_name (),
3100 "opacity", 1.0,
3101 NULL((void*)0));
3102 }
3103 ev_document_annotations_add_annotation (EV_DOCUMENT_ANNOTATIONS (view->document)((((EvDocumentAnnotations*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_annotations_get_type (
))))))),
3104 annot, &doc_rect);
3105 ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
3106
3107 /* If the page didn't have annots, mark the cache as dirty */
3108 if (!ev_page_cache_get_annot_mapping (view->page_cache, view->current_page))
3109 ev_page_cache_mark_dirty (view->page_cache, view->current_page, EV_PAGE_DATA_INCLUDE_ANNOTS);
3110
3111 if (EV_IS_ANNOTATION_MARKUP (annot)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_markup_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
3112 GtkWindow *parent;
3113 GtkWidget *window;
3114
3115 parent = GTK_WINDOW (gtk_widget_get_toplevel (GTK_WIDGET (view)))((((GtkWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(gtk_widget_get_toplevel (((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast
((GTypeInstance*) ((view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))))
), ((gtk_window_get_type ()))))));
3116 window = ev_view_create_annotation_window (view, annot, parent);
3117
3118 /* Show the annot window the first time */
3119 ev_view_annotation_show_popup_window (view, window);
3120 }
3121
3122 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, view->current_page, &doc_rect, &view_rect);
3123 view_rect.x -= view->scroll_x;
3124 view_rect.y -= view->scroll_y;
3125 region = cairo_region_create_rectangle (&view_rect);
3126 ev_view_reload_page (view, view->current_page, region);
3127 cairo_region_destroy (region);
3128
3129 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_ANNOT_ADDED], 0, annot);
3130}
3131
3132void
3133ev_view_focus_annotation (EvView *view,
3134 EvMapping *annot_mapping)
3135{
3136
3137 if (!EV_IS_DOCUMENT_ANNOTATIONS (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_document_annotations_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))))
3138 return;
3139
3140 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, annot_mapping,
3141 ev_annotation_get_page_index (EV_ANNOTATION (annot_mapping->data)((((EvAnnotation*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((annot_mapping->data)), ((ev_annotation_get_type()))))
))));
3142}
3143
3144void
3145ev_view_begin_add_annotation (EvView *view,
3146 EvAnnotationType annot_type)
3147{
3148 if (annot_type == EV_ANNOTATION_TYPE_UNKNOWN)
3149 return;
3150
3151 if (view->adding_annot)
3152 return;
3153
3154 view->adding_annot = TRUE(!(0));
3155 view->adding_annot_type = annot_type;
3156 ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_ADD);
3157}
3158
3159void
3160ev_view_cancel_add_annotation (EvView *view)
3161{
3162 gint x, y;
3163
3164 if (!view->adding_annot)
3165 return;
3166
3167 view->adding_annot = FALSE(0);
3168 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &x, &y);
3169 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
3170}
3171
3172void
3173ev_view_remove_annotation (EvView *view,
3174 EvAnnotation *annot)
3175{
3176 guint page;
3177
3178 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return; } } while (0);
3179 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_ANNOTATION (annot))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_get_type())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_ANNOTATION (annot)"); return; } } while (
0);
3180
3181 g_object_ref (annot);
3182
3183 page = ev_annotation_get_page_index (annot);
3184
3185 if (EV_IS_ANNOTATION_MARKUP (annot)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(annot)); GType __t = ((ev_annotation_markup_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) {
3186 EvViewWindowChild *child;
3187
3188 child = ev_view_find_window_child_for_annot (view, page, annot);
3189 if (child) {
3190 view->window_children = g_list_remove (view->window_children, child);
3191 gtk_widget_destroy (child->window);
3192 g_free (child);
3193 }
3194 }
3195 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, NULL((void*)0), -1);
3196
3197 ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
3198 ev_document_annotations_remove_annotation (EV_DOCUMENT_ANNOTATIONS (view->document)((((EvDocumentAnnotations*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_annotations_get_type (
))))))),
3199 annot);
3200 ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
3201
3202 ev_page_cache_mark_dirty (view->page_cache, page, EV_PAGE_DATA_INCLUDE_ANNOTS);
3203
3204 /* FIXME: only redraw the annot area */
3205 ev_view_reload_page (view, page, NULL((void*)0));
3206
3207 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_ANNOT_REMOVED], 0, annot);
3208 g_object_unref (annot);
3209}
3210
3211#ifdef ENABLE_SYNCTEX1
3212static gboolean
3213ev_view_synctex_backward_search (EvView *view,
3214 gdouble x,
3215 gdouble y)
3216{
3217 gint page = -1;
3218 gint x_new = 0, y_new = 0;
3219 EvSourceLink *link;
3220
3221 if (!ev_document_has_synctex (view->document))
3222 return FALSE(0);
3223
3224 if (!get_doc_point_from_location (view, x, y, &page, &x_new, &y_new))
3225 return FALSE(0);
3226
3227 link = ev_document_synctex_backward_search (view->document, page, x_new, y_new);
3228 if (link) {
3229 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_SYNC_SOURCE], 0, link);
3230 ev_source_link_free (link);
3231
3232 return TRUE(!(0));
3233 }
3234
3235 return FALSE(0);
3236}
3237#endif
3238
3239/* Caret navigation */
3240#define CURSOR_ON_MULTIPLIER2 2
3241#define CURSOR_OFF_MULTIPLIER1 1
3242#define CURSOR_PEND_MULTIPLIER3 3
3243#define CURSOR_DIVIDER3 3
3244
3245static inline gboolean
3246cursor_is_in_visible_page (EvView *view)
3247{
3248 return (view->cursor_page == view->current_page ||
3249 (view->cursor_page >= view->start_page &&
3250 view->cursor_page <= view->end_page));
3251}
3252
3253static gboolean
3254cursor_should_blink (EvView *view)
3255{
3256 if (view->caret_enabled &&
3257 view->rotation == 0 &&
3258 cursor_is_in_visible_page (view) &&
3259 gtk_widget_has_focus (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))) &&
3260 view->pixbuf_cache &&
3261 !ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_region (view->pixbuf_cache, view->cursor_page, view->scale)) {
3262 GtkSettings *settings;
3263 gboolean blink;
3264
3265 settings = gtk_widget_get_settings (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
3266 g_object_get (settings, "gtk-cursor-blink", &blink, NULL((void*)0));
3267
3268 return blink;
3269 }
3270
3271 return FALSE(0);
3272}
3273
3274static gint
3275get_cursor_blink_time (EvView *view)
3276{
3277 GtkSettings *settings = gtk_widget_get_settings (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
3278 gint time;
3279
3280 g_object_get (settings, "gtk-cursor-blink-time", &time, NULL((void*)0));
3281
3282 return time;
3283}
3284
3285static gint
3286get_cursor_blink_timeout_id (EvView *view)
3287{
3288 GtkSettings *settings = gtk_widget_get_settings (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
3289 gint timeout;
3290
3291 g_object_get (settings, "gtk-cursor-blink-timeout", &timeout, NULL((void*)0));
3292
3293 return timeout;
3294}
3295
3296static gboolean
3297get_caret_cursor_area (EvView *view,
3298 gint page,
3299 gint offset,
3300 GdkRectangle *area)
3301{
3302 EvRectangle *areas = NULL((void*)0);
3303 EvRectangle *doc_rect;
3304 guint n_areas = 0;
3305 gfloat cursor_aspect_ratio;
3306 gint stem_width;
3307
3308 if (!view->caret_enabled || view->rotation != 0)
3309 return FALSE(0);
3310
3311 if (!view->page_cache)
3312 return FALSE(0);
3313
3314 ev_page_cache_get_text_layout (view->page_cache, page, &areas, &n_areas);
3315 if (!areas)
3316 return FALSE(0);
3317
3318 if (offset > n_areas)
3319 return FALSE(0);
3320
3321 doc_rect = areas + offset;
3322 if (offset == n_areas ||
3323 ((doc_rect->x1 == doc_rect->x2 || doc_rect->y1 == doc_rect->y2) && offset > 0)) {
3324 EvRectangle *prev;
3325 EvRectangle last_rect;
3326
3327 /* Special characters like \n have an empty bounding box
3328 * and the end of a page doesn't have any bounding box,
3329 * use the size of the previous area.
3330 */
3331 prev = areas + offset - 1;
3332 last_rect.x1 = prev->x2;
3333 last_rect.y1 = prev->y1;
3334 last_rect.x2 = prev->x2 + (prev->x2 - prev->x1);
3335 last_rect.y2 = prev->y2;
3336
3337 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, &last_rect, area);
3338 } else {
3339 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, doc_rect, area);
3340 }
3341
3342 area->x -= view->scroll_x;
3343 area->y -= view->scroll_y;
3344
3345 gtk_style_context_get_style (gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
3346 "cursor-aspect-ratio", &cursor_aspect_ratio,
3347 NULL((void*)0));
3348 stem_width = area->height * cursor_aspect_ratio + 1;
3349 area->x -= (stem_width / 2);
3350 area->width = stem_width;
3351
3352 return TRUE(!(0));
3353}
3354
3355static void
3356show_cursor (EvView *view)
3357{
3358 GtkWidget *widget;
3359 GdkRectangle view_rect;
3360
3361 if (view->cursor_visible)
3362 return;
3363
3364 widget = GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))));
3365 view->cursor_visible = TRUE(!(0));
3366 if (gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) &&
3367 get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &view_rect)) {
3368 gtk_widget_queue_draw_area (widget,
3369 view_rect.x, view_rect.y,
3370 view_rect.width, view_rect.height);
3371 }
3372}
3373
3374static void
3375hide_cursor (EvView *view)
3376{
3377 GtkWidget *widget;
3378 GdkRectangle view_rect;
3379
3380 if (!view->cursor_visible)
3381 return;
3382
3383 widget = GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))));
3384 view->cursor_visible = FALSE(0);
3385 if (gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) &&
3386 get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &view_rect)) {
3387 gtk_widget_queue_draw_area (widget,
3388 view_rect.x, view_rect.y,
3389 view_rect.width, view_rect.height);
3390 }
3391}
3392
3393static gboolean
3394blink_cb (EvView *view)
3395{
3396 gint blink_timeout;
3397 guint blink_time;
3398
3399 blink_timeout = get_cursor_blink_timeout_id (view);
3400 if (view->cursor_blink_time > 1000 * blink_timeout && blink_timeout < G_MAXINT2147483647 / 1000) {
3401 /* We've blinked enough without the user doing anything, stop blinking */
3402 show_cursor (view);
3403 view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = 0;
3404
3405 return FALSE(0);
3406 }
3407
3408 blink_time = get_cursor_blink_time (view);
3409 if (view->cursor_visible) {
3410 hide_cursor (view);
3411 blink_time *= CURSOR_OFF_MULTIPLIER1;
3412 } else {
3413 show_cursor (view);
3414 view->cursor_blink_time += blink_time;
3415 blink_time *= CURSOR_ON_MULTIPLIER2;
3416 }
3417
3418 view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = gdk_threads_add_timeout (blink_time / CURSOR_DIVIDER3, (GSourceFunc)blink_cb, view);
3419
3420 return FALSE(0);
3421}
3422
3423static void
3424ev_view_check_cursor_blink (EvView *view)
3425{
3426 if (cursor_should_blink (view)) {
3427 if (view->cursor_blink_timeout_id == 0) {
3428 show_cursor (view);
3429 view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = gdk_threads_add_timeout (get_cursor_blink_time (view) * CURSOR_ON_MULTIPLIER2 / CURSOR_DIVIDER3,
3430 (GSourceFunc)blink_cb, view);
3431 }
3432
3433 return;
3434 }
3435
3436 if (view->cursor_blink_timeout_id > 0) {
3437 g_source_remove (view->cursor_blink_timeout_id);
3438 view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = 0;
3439 }
3440
3441 view->cursor_visible = TRUE(!(0));
3442 view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
3443}
3444
3445static void
3446ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (EvView *view)
3447{
3448 if (!cursor_should_blink (view))
3449 return;
3450
3451 if (view->cursor_blink_timeout_id > 0)
3452 g_source_remove (view->cursor_blink_timeout_id);
3453
3454 show_cursor (view);
3455 view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = gdk_threads_add_timeout (get_cursor_blink_time (view) * CURSOR_PEND_MULTIPLIER3 / CURSOR_DIVIDER3,
3456 (GSourceFunc)blink_cb, view);
3457}
3458
3459gboolean
3460ev_view_supports_caret_navigation (EvView *view)
3461{
3462 EvDocumentTextInterface *iface;
3463
3464 if (!view->document || !EV_IS_DOCUMENT_TEXT (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_document_text_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))))
3465 return FALSE(0);
3466
3467 iface = EV_DOCUMENT_TEXT_GET_IFACE (view->document)((((EvDocumentTextInterface*) g_type_interface_peek (((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)))->g_class, ((ev_document_text_get_type
()))))));
3468 if (!iface->get_text_layout || !iface->get_text)
3469 return FALSE(0);
3470
3471 return TRUE(!(0));
3472}
3473
3474void
3475ev_view_set_caret_navigation_enabled (EvView *view,
3476 gboolean enabled)
3477{
3478 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return; } } while (0);
3479
3480 if (view->caret_enabled != enabled) {
3481 view->caret_enabled = enabled;
3482 ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
3483
3484 if (cursor_is_in_visible_page (view))
3485 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
3486 }
3487}
3488
3489gboolean
3490ev_view_is_caret_navigation_enabled (EvView *view)
3491{
3492 g_return_val_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return ((0)); } } while (
0);
3493
3494 return view->caret_enabled;
3495}
3496
3497void
3498ev_view_set_caret_cursor_position (EvView *view,
3499 guint page,
3500 guint offset)
3501{
3502 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return; } } while (0);
3503 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_DOCUMENT (view->document))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_document_get_type (
))); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_
; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", (
(const char*) (__func__)), "EV_IS_DOCUMENT (view->document)"
); return; } } while (0);
3504 g_return_if_fail (page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)"
); return; } } while (0);
3505
3506 if (view->cursor_page != page || view->cursor_offset != offset) {
3507 view->cursor_page = page;
3508 view->cursor_offset = offset;
3509
3510 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_CURSOR_MOVED], 0,
3511 view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset);
3512
3513 if (view->caret_enabled && cursor_is_in_visible_page (view))
3514 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
3515 }
3516}
3517
3518/*** GtkWidget implementation ***/
3519
3520static void
3521ev_view_size_request_continuous_dual_page (EvView *view,
3522 GtkRequisition *requisition)
3523{
3524 gint n_pages;
3525
3526 n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) + 1;
3527 get_page_y_offset (view, n_pages, &requisition->height);
3528
3529 switch (view->sizing_mode) {
3530 case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
3531 case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
3532 case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
3533 requisition->width = 1;
3534
3535 break;
3536 case EV_SIZING_FREE: {
3537 gint max_width;
3538 GtkBorder border;
3539
3540 ev_view_get_max_page_size (view, &max_width, NULL((void*)0));
3541 compute_border (view, &border);
3542 requisition->width = (max_width + border.left + border.right) * 2 + (view->spacing * 3);
3543 }
3544 break;
3545 default:
3546 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 3546
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
3547 }
3548}
3549
3550static void
3551ev_view_size_request_continuous (EvView *view,
3552 GtkRequisition *requisition)
3553{
3554 gint n_pages;
3555
3556 n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
3557 get_page_y_offset (view, n_pages, &requisition->height);
3558
3559 switch (view->sizing_mode) {
3560 case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
3561 case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
3562 case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
3563 requisition->width = 1;
3564
3565 break;
3566 case EV_SIZING_FREE: {
3567 gint max_width;
3568 GtkBorder border;
3569
3570 ev_view_get_max_page_size (view, &max_width, NULL((void*)0));
3571 compute_border (view, &border);
3572 requisition->width = max_width + (view->spacing * 2) + border.left + border.right;
3573 }
3574 break;
3575 default:
3576 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 3576
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
3577 }
3578}
3579
3580static void
3581ev_view_size_request_dual_page (EvView *view,
3582 GtkRequisition *requisition)
3583{
3584 GtkBorder border;
3585 gint width, height;
3586
3587 if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE) {
3588 requisition->width = 1;
3589 requisition->height = 1;
3590
3591 return;
3592 }
3593
3594 /* Find the largest of the two. */
3595 ev_view_get_page_size (view,
3596 view->current_page,
3597 &width, &height);
3598 if (view->current_page + 1 < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)) {
3599 gint width_2, height_2;
3600 ev_view_get_page_size (view,
3601 view->current_page + 1,
3602 &width_2, &height_2);
3603 if (width_2 > width) {
3604 width = width_2;
3605 height = height_2;
3606 }
3607 }
3608 compute_border (view, &border);
3609
3610 requisition->width = view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH ? 1 :
3611 ((width + border.left + border.right) * 2) + (view->spacing * 3);
3612 requisition->height = (height + border.top + border.bottom) + (view->spacing * 2);
3613}
3614
3615static void
3616ev_view_size_request_single_page (EvView *view,
3617 GtkRequisition *requisition)
3618{
3619 GtkBorder border;
3620 gint width, height;
3621
3622 if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE) {
3623 requisition->width = 1;
3624 requisition->height = 1;
3625
3626 return;
3627 }
3628
3629 ev_view_get_page_size (view, view->current_page, &width, &height);
3630 compute_border (view, &border);
3631
3632 requisition->width = view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH ? 1 :
3633 width + border.left + border.right + (2 * view->spacing);
3634 requisition->height = height + border.top + border.bottom + (2 * view->spacing);
3635}
3636
3637static void
3638ev_view_size_request (GtkWidget *widget,
3639 GtkRequisition *requisition)
3640{
3641 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
3642 gboolean dual_page;
3643
3644 if (view->document == NULL((void*)0)) {
3645 view->requisition.width = 1;
3646 view->requisition.height = 1;
3647
3648 *requisition = view->requisition;
3649
3650 return;
3651 }
3652
3653 /* Get zoom for size here when not called from
3654 * ev_view_size_allocate()
3655 */
3656 if (!view->internal_size_request &&
3657 (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH ||
3658 view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE ||
3659 view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC)) {
3660 GtkAllocation allocation;
3661
3662 gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
3663 ev_view_zoom_for_size (view,
3664 allocation.width,
3665 allocation.height);
3666 }
3667
3668 dual_page = is_dual_page (view, NULL((void*)0));
3669 if (view->continuous && dual_page)
3670 ev_view_size_request_continuous_dual_page (view, &view->requisition);
3671 else if (view->continuous)
3672 ev_view_size_request_continuous (view, &view->requisition);
3673 else if (dual_page)
3674 ev_view_size_request_dual_page (view, &view->requisition);
3675 else
3676 ev_view_size_request_single_page (view, &view->requisition);
3677
3678 *requisition = view->requisition;
3679}
3680
3681static void
3682ev_view_get_preferred_width (GtkWidget *widget,
3683 gint *minimum,
3684 gint *natural)
3685{
3686 GtkRequisition requisition;
3687
3688 ev_view_size_request (widget, &requisition);
3689
3690 *minimum = *natural = requisition.width;
3691}
3692
3693static void
3694ev_view_get_preferred_height (GtkWidget *widget,
3695 gint *minimum,
3696 gint *natural)
3697{
3698 GtkRequisition requisition;
3699
3700 ev_view_size_request (widget, &requisition);
3701
3702 *minimum = *natural = requisition.height;
3703}
3704
3705static void
3706ev_view_size_allocate (GtkWidget *widget,
3707 GtkAllocation *allocation)
3708{
3709 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
3710 GList *l;
3711 gint root_x, root_y;
3712
3713 gtk_widget_set_allocation (widget, allocation);
3714
3715 if (gtk_widget_get_realized (widget))
3716 gdk_window_move_resize (gtk_widget_get_window (widget),
3717 allocation->x,
3718 allocation->y,
3719 allocation->width,
3720 allocation->height);
3721
3722 if (!view->document)
3723 return;
3724
3725 if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH ||
3726 view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE ||
3727 view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC) {
3728 GtkRequisition req;
3729
3730 ev_view_zoom_for_size (view,
3731 allocation->width,
3732 allocation->height);
3733 view->internal_size_request = TRUE(!(0));
3734 ev_view_size_request (widget, &req);
3735 view->internal_size_request = FALSE(0);
3736 }
3737
3738 view_set_adjustment_values (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
3739 view_set_adjustment_values (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
3740
3741 if (view->document)
3742 view_update_range_and_current_page (view);
3743
3744 view->pending_scroll = SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION;
3745 view->pending_resize = FALSE(0);
3746 view->pending_point.x = 0;
3747 view->pending_point.y = 0;
3748
3749 for (l = view->children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
3750 GdkRectangle view_area;
3751 EvViewChild *child = (EvViewChild *)l->data;
3752
3753 if (!gtk_widget_get_visible (child->widget))
3754 continue;
3755
3756 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, child->page, &child->doc_rect, &view_area);
3757 view_area.x -= view->scroll_x;
3758 view_area.y -= view->scroll_y;
3759
3760 gtk_widget_set_size_request (child->widget, view_area.width, view_area.height);
3761 gtk_widget_size_allocate (child->widget, &view_area);
3762 }
3763
3764 if (view->window_children)
3765 gdk_window_get_origin (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
3766 &root_x, &root_y);
3767
3768 for (l = view->window_children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
3769 EvViewWindowChild *child;
3770 EvRectangle doc_rect;
3771 GdkRectangle view_rect;
3772
3773 child = (EvViewWindowChild *)l->data;
3774
3775 ev_annotation_window_get_rectangle (EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (child->window)((((EvAnnotationWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((child->window)), ((ev_annotation_window_get_type())))
))), &doc_rect);
3776 if (child->moved) {
3777 doc_rect.x1 = child->orig_x;
3778 doc_rect.y1 = child->orig_y;
3779 }
3780 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, child->page, &doc_rect, &view_rect);
3781 view_rect.x -= view->scroll_x;
3782 view_rect.y -= view->scroll_y;
3783
3784 if (view_rect.x != child->orig_x || view_rect.y != child->orig_y) {
3785 child->parent_x = root_x;
3786 child->parent_y = root_y;
3787 ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, view_rect.x + root_x, view_rect.y + root_y);
3788 }
3789 }
3790}
3791
3792static gboolean
3793ev_view_scroll_event (GtkWidget *widget, GdkEventScroll *event)
3794{
3795 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
3796 guint state;
3797 gboolean fit_width, fit_height;
3798
3799 state = event->state & gtk_accelerator_get_default_mod_mask ();
3800
3801 if (state == GDK_CONTROL_MASK) {
3802 ev_document_model_set_sizing_mode (view->model, EV_SIZING_FREE);
3803 view->zoom_center_x = event->x;
3804 view->zoom_center_y = event->y;
3805 switch (event->direction) {
3806 case GDK_SCROLL_DOWN:
3807 case GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT:
3808 if (ev_view_can_zoom_out (view))
3809 ev_view_zoom_out (view);
3810 break;
3811 case GDK_SCROLL_UP:
3812 case GDK_SCROLL_LEFT:
3813 if (ev_view_can_zoom_in (view))
3814 ev_view_zoom_in (view);
3815 break;
3816 case GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH: {
3817 gdouble delta = event->delta_x + event->delta_y;
3818 gdouble factor = pow (delta < 0 ? ZOOM_IN_FACTOR1.2 : ZOOM_OUT_FACTOR(1.0/1.2), fabs (delta));
3819
3820 if ((factor < 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_out (view)) ||
3821 (factor >= 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_in (view)))
3822 ev_view_zoom (view, factor);
3823 }
3824 break;
3825 }
3826
3827 return TRUE(!(0));
3828 }
3829
3830 view->jump_to_find_result = FALSE(0);
3831
3832 /* Shift+Wheel scrolls the in the perpendicular direction */
3833 if (state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) {
3834 if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_UP)
3835 event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_LEFT;
3836 else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_LEFT)
3837 event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_UP;
3838 else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_DOWN)
3839 event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT;
3840 else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT)
3841 event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_DOWN;
3842 else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH) {
3843 /* Swap the deltas for perpendicular direction */
3844 gdouble tmp_delta = event->delta_x;
3845
3846 event->delta_x = event->delta_y;
3847 event->delta_y = tmp_delta;
3848 }
3849
3850 event->state &= ~GDK_SHIFT_MASK;
3851 state &= ~GDK_SHIFT_MASK;
3852 }
3853
3854 fit_width = ev_view_page_fits (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
3855 fit_height = ev_view_page_fits (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
3856 if (state == 0 && !view->continuous && (fit_width || fit_height)) {
3857 switch (event->direction) {
3858 case GDK_SCROLL_DOWN:
3859 if (fit_height) {
3860 ev_view_next_page (view);
3861 return TRUE(!(0));
3862 }
3863 break;
3864 case GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT:
3865 if (fit_width) {
3866 ev_view_next_page (view);
3867 return TRUE(!(0));
3868 }
3869 break;
3870 case GDK_SCROLL_UP:
3871 if (fit_height) {
3872 ev_view_previous_page (view);
3873 return TRUE(!(0));
3874 }
3875 break;
3876 case GDK_SCROLL_LEFT:
3877 if (fit_width) {
3878 ev_view_previous_page (view);
3879 return TRUE(!(0));
3880 }
3881 break;
3882 case GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH: {
3883 gdouble decrement;
3884 if ((fit_width && fit_height) ||
3885 ((fit_height && event->delta_x == 0.0) ||
3886 (fit_width && event->delta_y == 0.0))) {
3887 /* Emulate normal scrolling by summing the deltas */
3888 view->total_delta += event->delta_x + event->delta_y;
3889
3890 decrement = view->total_delta < 0 ? -1.0 : 1.0;
3891 for (; fabs (view->total_delta) >= 1.0; view->total_delta -= decrement) {
3892 if (decrement < 0)
3893 ev_view_previous_page (view);
3894 else
3895 ev_view_next_page (view);
3896 }
3897
3898 return TRUE(!(0));
3899 }
3900 }
3901 break;
3902 }
3903
3904 return FALSE(0);
3905 }
3906
3907 return FALSE(0);
3908}
3909
3910static EvViewSelection *
3911find_selection_for_page (EvView *view,
3912 gint page)
3913{
3914 GList *list;
3915
3916 for (list = view->selection_info.selections; list != NULL((void*)0); list = list->next) {
3917 EvViewSelection *selection;
3918
3919 selection = (EvViewSelection *) list->data;
3920
3921 if (selection->page == page)
3922 return selection;
3923 }
3924
3925 return NULL((void*)0);
3926}
3927
3928static void
3929ev_view_realize (GtkWidget *widget)
3930{
3931 GtkAllocation allocation;
3932 GdkWindow *window;
3933 GdkWindowAttr attributes;
3934 gint attributes_mask;
3935
3936 gtk_widget_set_realized (widget, TRUE(!(0)));
3937
3938 gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
3939
3940 attributes.window_type = GDK_WINDOW_CHILD;
3941 attributes.x = allocation.x;
3942 attributes.y = allocation.y;
3943 attributes.width = allocation.width;
3944 attributes.height = allocation.height;
3945 attributes.wclass = GDK_INPUT_OUTPUT;
3946 attributes.visual = gtk_widget_get_visual (widget);
3947 attributes.event_mask = gtk_widget_get_events (widget);
3948
3949 attributes_mask = GDK_WA_X | GDK_WA_Y | GDK_WA_VISUAL;
3950
3951 window = gdk_window_new (gtk_widget_get_parent_window (widget),
3952 &attributes, attributes_mask);
3953 gtk_widget_set_window (widget, window);
3954 gdk_window_set_user_data (window, widget);
3955}
3956
3957static void
3958get_cursor_color (GtkStyleContext *context,
3959 GdkRGBA *color)
3960{
3961 GdkColor *style_color;
3962
3963 gtk_style_context_get_style (context,
3964 "cursor-color",
3965 &style_color,
3966 NULL((void*)0));
3967
3968 if (style_color) {
3969 color->red = style_color->red / 65535.0;
3970 color->green = style_color->green / 65535.0;
3971 color->blue = style_color->blue / 65535.0;
3972 color->alpha = 1;
3973
3974 gdk_color_free (style_color);
3975 } else {
3976 gtk_style_context_save (context);
3977 gtk_style_context_get_color (context, GTK_STATE_FLAG_NORMAL, color);
3978 gtk_style_context_restore (context);
3979 }
3980}
3981
3982/* This is based on the deprecated function gtk_draw_insertion_cursor. */
3983static void
3984draw_caret_cursor (EvView *view,
3985 cairo_t *cr)
3986{
3987 GdkRectangle view_rect;
3988 GdkRGBA cursor_color;
3989
3990 if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &view_rect))
3991 return;
3992
3993 get_cursor_color (gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))), &cursor_color);
3994
3995 cairo_save (cr);
3996 gdk_cairo_set_source_rgba (cr, &cursor_color);
3997 cairo_rectangle (cr, view_rect.x, view_rect.y, view_rect.width, view_rect.height);
3998 cairo_fill (cr);
3999 cairo_restore (cr);
4000}
4001
4002static gboolean
4003should_draw_caret_cursor (EvView *view,
4004 gint page)
4005{
4006 return (view->caret_enabled &&
4007 view->cursor_page == page &&
4008 view->cursor_visible &&
4009 gtk_widget_has_focus (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))) &&
4010 !ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_region (view->pixbuf_cache, page, view->scale));
4011}
4012
4013static void
4014draw_focus (EvView *view,
4015 cairo_t *cr,
4016 gint page,
4017 GdkRectangle *clip)
4018{
4019 GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))));
4020 GdkRectangle rect;
4021 GdkRectangle intersect;
4022
4023 if (view->focused_element_page != page)
4024 return;
4025
4026 if (!ev_view_get_focused_area (view, &rect))
4027 return;
4028
4029 if (gdk_rectangle_intersect (&rect, clip, &intersect)) {
4030 gtk_render_focus (gtk_widget_get_style_context (widget),
4031 cr,
4032 intersect.x,
4033 intersect.y,
4034 intersect.width,
4035 intersect.height);
4036 }
4037}
4038
4039static gboolean
4040ev_view_draw (GtkWidget *widget,
4041 cairo_t *cr)
4042{
4043 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
4044 cairo_rectangle_int_t clip_rect;
4045 GdkRectangle *area = &clip_rect;
4046 gint i;
4047
4048 gtk_render_background (gtk_widget_get_style_context (widget),
4049 cr,
4050 0, 0,
4051 gtk_widget_get_allocated_width (widget),
4052 gtk_widget_get_allocated_height (widget));
4053
4054 if (view->document == NULL((void*)0))
4055 return FALSE(0);
4056
4057 if (!gdk_cairo_get_clip_rectangle (cr, &clip_rect))
4058 return FALSE(0);
4059
4060 for (i = view->start_page; i >= 0 && i <= view->end_page; i++) {
4061 GdkRectangle page_area;
4062 GtkBorder border;
4063 gboolean page_ready = TRUE(!(0));
4064
4065 if (!ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border))
4066 continue;
4067
4068 page_area.x -= view->scroll_x;
4069 page_area.y -= view->scroll_y;
4070
4071 draw_one_page (view, i, cr, &page_area, &border, area, &page_ready);
4072
4073 if (page_ready && should_draw_caret_cursor (view, i))
4074 draw_caret_cursor (view, cr);
4075 if (page_ready && view->find_pages && view->highlight_find_results)
4076 highlight_find_results (view, cr, i);
4077 if (page_ready && EV_IS_DOCUMENT_ANNOTATIONS (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_document_annotations_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))))
4078 show_annotation_windows (view, i);
4079 if (page_ready && view->focused_element)
4080 draw_focus (view, cr, i, &clip_rect);
4081#ifdef ENABLE_SYNCTEX1
4082 if (page_ready && view->synctex_result)
4083 highlight_forward_search_results (view, cr, i);
4084#endif
4085 }
4086
4087 if (GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (ev_view_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*) (
(ev_view_parent_class)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))->draw)
4088 (* GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (ev_view_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*) (
(ev_view_parent_class)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))->draw) (widget, cr);
4089
4090 return FALSE(0);
4091}
4092
4093static void
4094ev_view_set_focused_element_at_location (EvView *view,
4095 gdouble x,
4096 gdouble y)
4097{
4098 EvMapping *mapping;
4099 EvFormField *field;
4100 gint page;
4101
4102 mapping = get_annotation_mapping_at_location (view, x, y, &page);
4103 if (mapping) {
4104 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, mapping, page);
4105 return;
4106 }
4107
4108 mapping = get_link_mapping_at_location (view, x, y, &page);
4109 if (mapping) {
4110 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, mapping, page);
4111 return;
4112 }
4113
4114 if ((field = ev_view_get_form_field_at_location (view, x, y))) {
4115 ev_view_remove_all (view);
4116 _ev_view_focus_form_field (view, field);
4117 return;
4118 }
4119
4120 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, NULL((void*)0), -1);
4121}
4122
4123static gboolean
4124ev_view_do_popup_menu (EvView *view,
4125 gdouble x,
4126 gdouble y)
4127{
4128 GList *items = NULL((void*)0);
4129 EvLink *link;
4130 EvImage *image;
4131 EvAnnotation *annot;
4132
4133 image = ev_view_get_image_at_location (view, x, y);
4134 if (image)
4135 items = g_list_prepend (items, image);
4136
4137 link = ev_view_get_link_at_location (view, x, y);
4138 if (link)
4139 items = g_list_prepend (items, link);
4140
4141 annot = ev_view_get_annotation_at_location (view, x, y);
4142 if (annot)
4143 items = g_list_prepend (items, annot);
4144
4145 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_POPUP_MENU], 0, items);
4146
4147 g_list_free (items);
4148
4149 return TRUE(!(0));
4150}
4151
4152static gboolean
4153ev_view_popup_menu (GtkWidget *widget)
4154{
4155 gint x, y;
4156
4157 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
4158 return ev_view_do_popup_menu (EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ())))))), x, y);
4159}
4160
4161static void
4162get_link_area (EvView *view,
4163 gint x,
4164 gint y,
4165 EvLink *link,
4166 GdkRectangle *area)
4167{
4168 EvMappingList *link_mapping;
4169 gint page;
4170 gint x_offset = 0, y_offset = 0;
4171
4172 x += view->scroll_x;
4173 y += view->scroll_y;
4174
4175 find_page_at_location (view, x, y, &page, &x_offset, &y_offset);
4176
4177 link_mapping = ev_page_cache_get_link_mapping (view->page_cache, page);
4178 ev_view_get_area_from_mapping (view, page,
4179 link_mapping,
4180 link, area);
4181}
4182
4183static void
4184get_annot_area (EvView *view,
4185 gint x,
4186 gint y,
4187 EvAnnotation *annot,
4188 GdkRectangle *area)
4189{
4190 EvMappingList *annot_mapping;
4191 gint page;
4192 gint x_offset = 0, y_offset = 0;
4193
4194 x += view->scroll_x;
4195 y += view->scroll_y;
4196
4197 find_page_at_location (view, x, y, &page, &x_offset, &y_offset);
4198
4199 annot_mapping = ev_page_cache_get_annot_mapping (view->page_cache, page);
4200 ev_view_get_area_from_mapping (view, page,
4201 annot_mapping,
4202 annot, area);
4203}
4204
4205static gboolean
4206ev_view_query_tooltip (GtkWidget *widget,
4207 gint x,
4208 gint y,
4209 gboolean keyboard_tip,
4210 GtkTooltip *tooltip)
4211{
4212 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
4213 EvLink *link;
4214 EvAnnotation *annot;
4215 gchar *text;
4216
4217 annot = ev_view_get_annotation_at_location (view, x, y);
4218 if (annot) {
4219 const gchar *contents;
4220
4221 if ((contents = ev_annotation_get_contents (annot))) {
4222 GdkRectangle annot_area;
4223
4224 get_annot_area (view, x, y, annot, &annot_area);
4225 gtk_tooltip_set_text (tooltip, contents);
4226 gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area (tooltip, &annot_area);
4227
4228 return TRUE(!(0));
4229 }
4230 }
4231
4232 link = ev_view_get_link_at_location (view, x, y);
4233 if (!link)
4234 return FALSE(0);
4235
4236 text = tip_from_link (view, link);
4237 if (text && g_utf8_validate (text, -1, NULL((void*)0))) {
4238 GdkRectangle link_area;
4239
4240 get_link_area (view, x, y, link, &link_area);
4241 gtk_tooltip_set_text (tooltip, text);
4242 gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area (tooltip, &link_area);
4243 g_free (text);
4244
4245 return TRUE(!(0));
4246 }
4247 g_free (text);
4248
4249 return FALSE(0);
4250}
4251
4252static void
4253start_selection_for_event (EvView *view,
4254 GdkEventButton *event)
4255{
4256 clear_selection (view);
4257
4258 view->selection_info.start.x = event->x + view->scroll_x;
4259 view->selection_info.start.y = event->y + view->scroll_y;
4260
4261 switch (event->type) {
4262 case GDK_2BUTTON_PRESS:
4263 view->selection_info.style = EV_SELECTION_STYLE_WORD;
4264 break;
4265 case GDK_3BUTTON_PRESS:
4266 view->selection_info.style = EV_SELECTION_STYLE_LINE;
4267 break;
4268 default:
4269 view->selection_info.style = EV_SELECTION_STYLE_GLYPH;
4270 return;
4271 }
4272
4273 /* In case of WORD or LINE, compute selections now */
4274 compute_selections (view,
4275 view->selection_info.style,
4276 &(view->selection_info.start),
4277 &(view->selection_info.start));
4278}
4279
4280gint
4281_ev_view_get_caret_cursor_offset_at_doc_point (EvView *view,
4282 gint page,
4283 gdouble doc_x,
4284 gdouble doc_y)
4285{
4286 EvRectangle *areas = NULL((void*)0);
4287 guint n_areas = 0;
4288 gint offset = -1;
4289 gint first_line_offset;
4290 gint last_line_offset = -1;
4291 EvRectangle *rect;
4292 guint i;
4293
4294 ev_page_cache_get_text_layout (view->page_cache, page, &areas, &n_areas);
4295 if (!areas)
4296 return -1;
4297
4298 i = 0;
4299 while (i < n_areas && offset == -1) {
4300 rect = areas + i;
4301
4302 first_line_offset = -1;
4303 while (doc_y >= rect->y1 && doc_y <= rect->y2) {
4304 if (first_line_offset == -1) {
4305 if (doc_x <= rect->x1) {
4306 /* Location is before the start of the line */
4307 if (last_line_offset != -1) {
4308 EvRectangle *last = areas + last_line_offset;
4309 gint dx1, dx2;
4310
4311 /* If there's a previous line, check distances */
4312
4313 dx1 = doc_x - last->x2;
4314 dx2 = rect->x1 - doc_x;
4315
4316 if (dx1 < dx2)
4317 offset = last_line_offset;
4318 else
4319 offset = i;
4320 } else {
4321 offset = i;
4322 }
4323
4324 last_line_offset = i + 1;
4325 break;
4326 }
4327 first_line_offset = i;
4328 }
4329 last_line_offset = i + 1;
4330
4331 if (doc_x >= rect->x1 && doc_x <= rect->x2) {
4332 /* Location is inside the line. Position the caret before
4333 * or after the character, depending on whether the point
4334 * falls within the left or right half of the bounding box.
4335 */
