4336 if (doc_x <= rect->x1 + (rect->x2 - rect->x1) / 2)
4337 offset = i;
4338 else
4339 offset = i + 1;
4340 break;
4341 }
4342
4343 i++;
4344 rect = areas + i;
4345 }
4346
4347 if (first_line_offset == -1)
4348 i++;
4349 }
4350
4351 if (last_line_offset == -1)
4352 return -1;
4353
4354 if (offset == -1)
4355 offset = last_line_offset;
4356
4357 return offset;
4358}
4359
4360static gboolean
4361position_caret_cursor_at_doc_point (EvView *view,
4362 gint page,
4363 gdouble doc_x,
4364 gdouble doc_y)
4365{
4366 gint offset;
4367
4368 offset = _ev_view_get_caret_cursor_offset_at_doc_point (view, page, doc_x, doc_y);
4369 if (offset == -1)
4370 return FALSE(0);
4371
4372 if (view->cursor_offset != offset || view->cursor_page != page) {
4373 view->cursor_offset = offset;
4374 view->cursor_page = page;
4375
4376 return TRUE(!(0));
4377 }
4378
4379 return FALSE(0);
4380}
4381
4382static gboolean
4383position_caret_cursor_at_location (EvView *view,
4384 gdouble x,
4385 gdouble y)
4386{
4387 gint page;
4388 gint doc_x, doc_y;
4389
4390 if (!view->caret_enabled || view->rotation != 0)
4391 return FALSE(0);
4392
4393 if (!view->page_cache)
4394 return FALSE(0);
4395
4396 /* Get the offset from the doc point */
4397 if (!get_doc_point_from_location (view, x, y, &page, &doc_x, &doc_y))
4398 return FALSE(0);
4399
4400 return position_caret_cursor_at_doc_point (view, page, doc_x, doc_y);
4401}
4402
4403static gboolean
4404position_caret_cursor_for_event (EvView *view,
4405 GdkEventButton *event,
4406 gboolean redraw)
4407{
4408 GdkRectangle area;
4409 GdkRectangle prev_area = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
4410
4411 if (redraw)
4412 get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &prev_area);
4413
4414 if (!position_caret_cursor_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))
4415 return FALSE(0);
4416
4417 if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &area))
4418 return FALSE(0);
4419
4420 view->cursor_line_offset = area.x;
4421
4422 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_CURSOR_MOVED], 0, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset);
4423
4424 if (redraw) {
4425 cairo_region_t *damage_region;
4426
4427 damage_region = cairo_region_create_rectangle (&prev_area);
4428 cairo_region_union_rectangle (damage_region, &area);
4429 gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
4430 damage_region, TRUE(!(0)));
4431 cairo_region_destroy (damage_region);
4432 }
4433
4434 return TRUE(!(0));
4435}
4436
4437static gboolean
4438ev_view_button_press_event (GtkWidget *widget,
4439 GdkEventButton *event)
4440{
4441 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
4442
4443 if (!view->document || ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) <= 0)
4444 return FALSE(0);
4445
4446 if (gtk_gesture_is_recognized (view->zoom_gesture))
4447 return TRUE(!(0));
4448
4449 if (!gtk_widget_has_focus (widget)) {
4450 gtk_widget_grab_focus (widget);
4451 }
4452
4453 if (view->window_child_focus) {
4454 EvAnnotationWindow *window;
4455
4456 window = EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (view->window_child_focus->window)((((EvAnnotationWindow*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->window_child_focus->window)), ((ev_annotation_window_get_type
()))))));
4457 ev_annotation_window_ungrab_focus (window);
4458 view->window_child_focus = NULL((void*)0);
4459 }
4460
4461 view->pressed_button = event->button;
4462 view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
4463
4464 if (view->adding_annot)
4465 return FALSE(0);
4466
4467 if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling)
4468 return TRUE(!(0));
4469
4470 switch (event->button) {
4471 case 1: {
4472 EvImage *image;
4473 EvAnnotation *annot;
4474 EvFormField *field;
4475 EvMapping *link;
4476 gint page;
4477#ifdef ENABLE_SYNCTEX1
4478 if (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK)
4479 return ev_view_synctex_backward_search (view, event->x , event->y);
4480#endif
4481
4482 if (EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_selection_get_type ())
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))) && view->selection_info.selections) {
4483 if (event->type == GDK_3BUTTON_PRESS) {
4484 start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4485 } else if (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) {
4486 GdkPoint end_point;
4487
4488 end_point.x = event->x + view->scroll_x;
4489 end_point.y = event->y + view->scroll_y;
4490 extend_selection (view, &view->selection_info.start, &end_point);
4491 } else if (location_in_selected_text (view,
4492 event->x + view->scroll_x,
4493 event->y + view->scroll_y)) {
4494 view->selection_info.in_drag = TRUE(!(0));
4495 } else {
4496 start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4497 if (position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, TRUE(!(0)))) {
4498 view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
4499 ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
4500 }
4501 }
4502 } else if ((annot = ev_view_get_annotation_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4503 ev_view_handle_annotation (view, annot, event->x, event->y, event->time);
4504 } else if ((field = ev_view_get_form_field_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4505 ev_view_remove_all (view);
4506 ev_view_handle_form_field (view, field);
4507 } else if ((link = get_link_mapping_at_location (view, event->x, event->y, &page))){
4508 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, link, page);
4509 } else if (!location_in_text (view, event->x + view->scroll_x, event->y + view->scroll_y) &&
4510 (image = ev_view_get_image_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4511 if (view->image_dnd_info.image)
4512 g_object_unref (view->image_dnd_info.image);
4513 view->image_dnd_info.image = g_object_ref (image);
4514 view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = TRUE(!(0));
4515
4516 view->image_dnd_info.start.x = event->x + view->scroll_x;
4517 view->image_dnd_info.start.y = event->y + view->scroll_y;
4518 } else {
4519 ev_view_remove_all (view);
4520 _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, NULL((void*)0), -1);
4521
4522 if (view->synctex_result) {
4523 g_free (view->synctex_result);
4524 view->synctex_result = NULL((void*)0);
4525 gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
4526 }
4527
4528 if (EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_selection_get_type ())
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))))
4529 start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4530
4531 if (position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, TRUE(!(0)))) {
4532 view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
4533 ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
4534 }
4535 }
4536 }
4537 return TRUE(!(0));
4538 case 2:
4539 /* use root coordinates as reference point because
4540 * scrolling changes window relative coordinates */
4541 view->drag_info.start.x = event->x_root;
4542 view->drag_info.start.y = event->y_root;
4543 view->drag_info.hadj = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
4544 view->drag_info.vadj = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
4545
4546 ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_DRAG);
4547 ev_view_set_focused_element_at_location (view, event->x, event->y);
4548 return TRUE(!(0));
4549 case 3:
4550 view->scroll_info.start_y = event->y;
4551 ev_view_set_focused_element_at_location (view, event->x, event->y);
4552 return ev_view_do_popup_menu (view, event->x, event->y);
4553 }
4554
4555 return FALSE(0);
4556}
4557
4558static void
4559ev_view_remove_all (EvView *view)
4560{
4561 gtk_container_foreach (GTK_CONTAINER (view)((((GtkContainer*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view)), ((gtk_container_get_type ())))))), (GtkCallback) gtk_widget_destroy, NULL((void*)0));
4562 GList *children, *child;
4563
4564 children = gtk_container_get_children (GTK_CONTAINER (view)((((GtkContainer*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view)), ((gtk_container_get_type ())))))));
4565 for (child = children; child && child->data; child = g_list_next (child)((child) ? (((GList *)(child))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
4566 gtk_container_remove (GTK_CONTAINER (view)((((GtkContainer*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view)), ((gtk_container_get_type ())))))),
4567 GTK_WIDGET (child->data)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(child->data)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
4568 }
4569 g_list_free (children);
4570}
4571
4572/*** Drag and Drop ***/
4573static void
4574ev_view_drag_data_get (GtkWidget *widget,
4575 GdkDragContext *context,
4576 GtkSelectionData *selection_data,
4577 guint info,
4578 guint time)
4579{
4580 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
4581
4582 switch (info) {
4583 case TARGET_DND_TEXT:
4584 if (EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_selection_get_type ())
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))) &&
4585 view->selection_info.selections) {
4586 gchar *text;
4587
4588 text = get_selected_text (view);
4589 gtk_selection_data_set_text (selection_data,
4590 text,
4591 strlen (text));
4592 g_free (text);
4593 }
4594 break;
4595 case TARGET_DND_IMAGE:
4596 if (view->image_dnd_info.image) {
4597 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
4598
4599 ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
4600 pixbuf = ev_document_images_get_image (EV_DOCUMENT_IMAGES (view->document)((((EvDocumentImages*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_images_get_type ())))
))),
4601 view->image_dnd_info.image);
4602 ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
4603
4604 gtk_selection_data_set_pixbuf (selection_data, pixbuf);
4605 g_object_unref (pixbuf);
4606 }
4607 break;
4608 case TARGET_DND_URI:
4609 if (view->image_dnd_info.image) {
4610 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
4611 const gchar *tmp_uri;
4612 gchar *uris[2];
4613
4614 ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
4615 pixbuf = ev_document_images_get_image (EV_DOCUMENT_IMAGES (view->document)((((EvDocumentImages*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->document)), ((ev_document_images_get_type ())))
))),
4616 view->image_dnd_info.image);
4617 ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
4618
4619 tmp_uri = ev_image_save_tmp (view->image_dnd_info.image, pixbuf);
4620 g_object_unref (pixbuf);
4621
4622 uris[0] = (gchar *)tmp_uri;
4623 uris[1] = NULL((void*)0);
4624 gtk_selection_data_set_uris (selection_data, uris);
4625 }
4626 }
4627}
4628
4629static gboolean
4630ev_view_drag_motion (GtkWidget *widget,
4631 GdkDragContext *context,
4632 gint x,
4633 gint y,
4634 guint time)
4635{
4636 if (gtk_drag_get_source_widget (context) == widget)
4637 gdk_drag_status (context, 0, time);
4638 else
4639 gdk_drag_status (context, gdk_drag_context_get_suggested_action (context), time);
4640
4641 return TRUE(!(0));
4642}
4643
4644static gboolean
4645selection_update_idle_cb (EvView *view)
4646{
4647 compute_selections (view,
4648 view->selection_info.style,
4649 &view->selection_info.start,
4650 &view->motion);
4651 view->selection_update_id = 0;
4652 return FALSE(0);
4653}
4654
4655static gboolean
4656selection_scroll_timeout_cb (EvView *view)
4657{
4658 gint x, y, shift = 0;
4659 GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))));
4660 GtkAllocation allocation;
4661
4662 gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
4663 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
4664
4665 if (y > allocation.height) {
4666 shift = (y - allocation.height) / 2;
4667 } else if (y < 0) {
4668 shift = y / 2;
4669 }
4670
4671 if (shift)
4672 gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment,
4673 CLAMP (gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift,(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->vadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->vadjustment) + shift)))
4674 gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment),(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->vadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->vadjustment) + shift)))
4675 gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) -(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->vadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->vadjustment) + shift)))
4676 gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment))(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->vadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->vadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->vadjustment) + shift))));
4677
4678 if (x > allocation.width) {
4679 shift = (x - allocation.width) / 2;
4680 } else if (x < 0) {
4681 shift = x / 2;
4682 }
4683
4684 if (shift)
4685 gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->hadjustment,
4686 CLAMP (gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift,(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->hadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->hadjustment) + shift)))
4687 gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment),(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->hadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->hadjustment) + shift)))
4688 gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) -(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->hadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->hadjustment) + shift)))
4689 gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment))(((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift) >
(gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->hadjustment))) ? (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->
hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment
)) : (((gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment) + shift
) < (gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_lower (view->hadjustment)) : (gtk_adjustment_get_value
(view->hadjustment) + shift))));
4690
4691 return TRUE(!(0));
4692}
4693
4694static gboolean
4695ev_view_drag_update_momentum (EvView *view)
4696{
4697 int i;
4698 if (!view->drag_info.in_drag)
4699 return FALSE(0);
4700
4701 for (i = DRAG_HISTORY10 - 1; i > 0; i--) {
4702 view->drag_info.buffer[i].x = view->drag_info.buffer[i-1].x;
4703 view->drag_info.buffer[i].y = view->drag_info.buffer[i-1].y;
4704 }
4705
4706 /* Momentum is a moving average of 10ms granularity over
4707 * the last 100ms with each 10ms stored in buffer.
4708 */
4709
4710 view->drag_info.momentum.x = (view->drag_info.buffer[DRAG_HISTORY10 - 1].x - view->drag_info.buffer[0].x);
4711 view->drag_info.momentum.y = (view->drag_info.buffer[DRAG_HISTORY10 - 1].y - view->drag_info.buffer[0].y);
4712
4713 return TRUE(!(0));
4714}
4715
4716static gboolean
4717ev_view_scroll_drag_release (EvView *view)
4718{
4719 gdouble dhadj_value, dvadj_value;
4720 gdouble oldhadjustment, oldvadjustment;
4721 gdouble h_page_size, v_page_size;
4722 gdouble h_upper, v_upper;
4723 GtkAllocation allocation;
4724
4725 view->drag_info.momentum.x /= 1.2;
4726 view->drag_info.momentum.y /= 1.2; /* Alter these constants to change "friction" */
4727
4728 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &allocation);
4729
4730 h_page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment);
4731 v_page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment);
4732
4733 dhadj_value = h_page_size *
4734 (gdouble)view->drag_info.momentum.x / allocation.width;
4735 dvadj_value = v_page_size *
4736 (gdouble)view->drag_info.momentum.y / allocation.height;
4737
4738 oldhadjustment = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
4739 oldvadjustment = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
4740
4741 h_upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment);
4742 v_upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment);
4743
4744 /* When we reach the edges, we need either to absorb some momentum and bounce by
4745 * multiplying it on -0.5 or stop scrolling by setting momentum to 0. */
4746 if (((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) > (h_upper - h_page_size)) ||
4747 ((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) < 0))
4748 view->drag_info.momentum.x = 0;
4749 if (((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) > (v_upper - v_page_size)) ||
4750 ((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) < 0))
4751 view->drag_info.momentum.y = 0;
4752
4753 gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->hadjustment,
4754 MIN (oldhadjustment + dhadj_value,(((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) < (h_upper - h_page_size)
) ? (oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) : (h_upper - h_page_size))
4755 h_upper - h_page_size)(((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) < (h_upper - h_page_size)
) ? (oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) : (h_upper - h_page_size)));
4756 gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment,
4757 MIN (oldvadjustment + dvadj_value,(((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) < (v_upper - v_page_size)
) ? (oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) : (v_upper - v_page_size))
4758 v_upper - v_page_size)(((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) < (v_upper - v_page_size)
) ? (oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) : (v_upper - v_page_size)));
4759
4760 if (((view->drag_info.momentum.x < 1) && (view->drag_info.momentum.x > -1)) &&
4761 ((view->drag_info.momentum.y < 1) && (view->drag_info.momentum.y > -1)))
4762 return FALSE(0);
4763 else
4764 return TRUE(!(0));
4765}
4766
4767static gboolean
4768ev_view_motion_notify_event (GtkWidget *widget,
4769 GdkEventMotion *event)
4770{
4771 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
4772 GdkWindow *bin_window;
4773 gint x, y;
4774
4775 if (!view->document)
4776 return FALSE(0);
4777
4778 if (gtk_gesture_is_recognized (view->zoom_gesture))
4779 return TRUE(!(0));
4780
4781 bin_window = gtk_widget_get_window (widget);
4782
4783 if (event->is_hint || event->window != bin_window) {
4784 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
4785 } else {
4786 x = event->x;
4787 y = event->y;
4788 }
4789
4790 if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling) {
4791 view->scroll_info.last_y = y;
4792 return TRUE(!(0));
4793 }
4794
4795 if (view->selection_info.in_drag) {
4796 if (gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
4797 view->selection_info.start.x,
4798 view->selection_info.start.y,
4799 x, y)) {
4800 GtkTargetList *target_list = gtk_target_list_new (NULL((void*)0), 0);
4801
4802 gtk_target_list_add_text_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_TEXT);
4803
4804 gtk_drag_begin_with_coordinates (widget, target_list,
4805 GDK_ACTION_COPY,
4806 1, (GdkEvent *)event,
4807 event->x,
4808 event->y);
4809
4810 view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
4811 view->pressed_button = -1;
4812
4813 gtk_target_list_unref (target_list);
4814
4815 return TRUE(!(0));
4816 }
4817 } else if (view->image_dnd_info.in_drag) {
4818 if (gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
4819 view->selection_info.start.x,
4820 view->selection_info.start.y,
4821 x, y)) {
4822 GtkTargetList *target_list = gtk_target_list_new (NULL((void*)0), 0);
4823
4824 gtk_target_list_add_uri_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_URI);
4825 gtk_target_list_add_image_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_IMAGE, TRUE(!(0)));
4826
4827 gtk_drag_begin_with_coordinates (widget, target_list,
4828 GDK_ACTION_COPY,
4829 1, (GdkEvent *)event,
4830 event->x,
4831 event->y);
4832
4833 view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
4834 view->pressed_button = -1;
4835
4836 gtk_target_list_unref (target_list);
4837
4838 return TRUE(!(0));
4839 }
4840 }
4841
4842 switch (view->pressed_button) {
4843 case 1:
4844 /* For the Atril 0.4.x release, we limit selection to un-rotated
4845 * documents only.
4846 */
4847 if (view->rotation != 0)
4848 return FALSE(0);
4849
4850 /* Schedule timeout to scroll during selection and additionally
4851 * scroll once to allow arbitrary speed. */
4852 if (!view->selection_scroll_id)
4853 view->selection_scroll_id = g_timeout_add (SCROLL_TIME150,
4854 (GSourceFunc)selection_scroll_timeout_cb,
4855 view);
4856 else
4857 selection_scroll_timeout_cb (view);
4858
4859 view->motion.x = x + view->scroll_x;
4860 view->motion.y = y + view->scroll_y;
4861
4862 /* Queue an idle to handle the motion. We do this because
4863 * handling any selection events in the motion could be slower
4864 * than new motion events reach us. We always put it in the
4865 * idle to make sure we catch up and don't visibly lag the
4866 * mouse. */
4867 if (!view->selection_update_id)
4868 view->selection_update_id = g_idle_add ((GSourceFunc)selection_update_idle_cb, view);
4869
4870 return TRUE(!(0));
4871 case 2:
4872 if (!view->drag_info.in_drag) {
4873 gboolean start;
4874 int i;
4875
4876 start = gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
4877 view->drag_info.start.x,
4878 view->drag_info.start.y,
4879 event->x_root,
4880 event->y_root);
4881 view->drag_info.in_drag = start;
4882 view->drag_info.drag_timeout_id = g_timeout_add (10,
4883 (GSourceFunc)ev_view_drag_update_momentum, view);
4884 /* Set 100 to choose how long it takes to build up momentum */
4885 /* Clear out previous momentum info: */
4886 for (i = 0; i < DRAG_HISTORY10; i++) {
4887 view->drag_info.buffer[i].x = event->x;
4888 view->drag_info.buffer[i].y = event->y;
4889 }
4890 view->drag_info.momentum.x = 0;
4891 view->drag_info.momentum.y = 0;
4892 }
4893
4894 if (view->drag_info.in_drag) {
4895 int dx, dy;
4896 gdouble dhadj_value, dvadj_value;
4897 GtkAllocation allocation;
4898
4899 view->drag_info.buffer[0].x = event->x;
4900 view->drag_info.buffer[0].y = event->y;
4901
4902 dx = event->x_root - view->drag_info.start.x;
4903 dy = event->y_root - view->drag_info.start.y;
4904
4905 gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
4906
4907 dhadj_value = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment) *
4908 (gdouble)dx / allocation.width;
4909 dvadj_value = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment) *
4910 (gdouble)dy / allocation.height;
4911
4912 /* clamp scrolling to visible area */
4913 gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->hadjustment,
4914 MIN (view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value,(((view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value) < (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
hadjustment))) ? (view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value) : (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
hadjustment)))
4915 gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) -(((view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value) < (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
hadjustment))) ? (view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value) : (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
hadjustment)))
4916 gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment))(((view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value) < (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
hadjustment))) ? (view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value) : (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->hadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
hadjustment))));
4917 gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment,
4918 MIN (view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value,(((view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value) < (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
vadjustment))) ? (view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value) : (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
vadjustment)))
4919 gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) -(((view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value) < (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
vadjustment))) ? (view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value) : (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
vadjustment)))
4920 gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment))(((view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value) < (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
vadjustment))) ? (view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value) : (gtk_adjustment_get_upper
(view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->
vadjustment))));
4921
4922 return TRUE(!(0));
4923 }
4924
4925 break;
4926 default:
4927 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
4928 }
4929
4930 return FALSE(0);
4931}
4932
4933static gboolean
4934ev_view_button_release_event (GtkWidget *widget,
4935 GdkEventButton *event)
4936{
4937 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
4938 EvLink *link = NULL((void*)0);
4939
4940 view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
4941
4942 if (gtk_gesture_is_recognized (view->zoom_gesture))
4943 return TRUE(!(0));
4944
4945 if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling) {
4946 ev_view_autoscroll_stop (view);
4947 view->pressed_button = -1;
4948
4949 return TRUE(!(0));
4950 }
4951
4952 if (view->pressed_button == 1 && event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) {
4953 view->pressed_button = -1;
4954 return TRUE(!(0));
4955 }
4956
4957 if (view->drag_info.in_drag) {
4958 view->drag_info.release_timeout_id =
4959 g_timeout_add (20,
4960 (GSourceFunc)ev_view_scroll_drag_release, view);
4961 }
4962
4963 if (view->document && !view->drag_info.in_drag && view->pressed_button != 3) {
4964 link = ev_view_get_link_at_location (view, event->x, event->y);
4965 }
4966
4967 view->drag_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
4968
4969 if (view->adding_annot && view->pressed_button == 1) {
4970 view->adding_annot = FALSE(0);
4971 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, event->x, event->y);
4972 view->pressed_button = -1;
4973
4974 ev_view_create_annotation (view,
4975 view->adding_annot_type,
4976 event->x + view->scroll_x,
4977 event->y + view->scroll_y);
4978
4979 return FALSE(0);
4980 }
4981
4982 if (view->pressed_button == 2) {
4983 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, event->x, event->y);
4984 }
4985
4986 view->pressed_button = -1;
4987
4988 if (view->selection_scroll_id) {
4989 g_source_remove (view->selection_scroll_id);
4990 view->selection_scroll_id = 0;
4991 }
4992 if (view->selection_update_id) {
4993 g_source_remove (view->selection_update_id);
4994 view->selection_update_id = 0;
4995 }
4996
4997 if (view->selection_info.selections) {
4998 clear_link_selected (view);
4999 ev_view_update_primary_selection (view);
5000
5001 position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, FALSE(0));
5002
5003 if (view->selection_info.in_drag)
5004 clear_selection (view);
5005 view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
5006 } else if (link) {
5007 if (event->button == 2) {
5008 EvLinkAction *action;
5009 EvLinkActionType type;
5010
5011 action = ev_link_get_action (link);
5012 if (!action)
5013 return FALSE(0);
5014
5015 type = ev_link_action_get_action_type (action);
5016 if (type == EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_DEST) {
5017 g_signal_emit (view,
5018 signals[SIGNAL_EXTERNAL_LINK],
5019 0, action);
5020 }
5021 } else {
5022 ev_view_handle_link (view, link);
5023 }
5024 }
5025
5026 return FALSE(0);
5027}
5028
5029static gboolean
5030ev_view_forward_key_event_to_focused_child (EvView *view,
5031 GdkEventKey *event)
5032{
5033 GtkWidget *child_widget = NULL((void*)0);
5034 GdkEventKey *new_event;
5035 gboolean handled;
5036
5037 if (view->window_child_focus) {
5038 child_widget = view->window_child_focus->window;
5039 } else if (view->children) {
5040 EvViewChild *child = (EvViewChild *)view->children->data;
5041
5042 child_widget = child->widget;
5043 } else {
5044 return FALSE(0);
5045 }
5046
5047 new_event = (GdkEventKey *) gdk_event_copy ((GdkEvent *)event);
5048 g_object_unref (new_event->window);
5049 new_event->window = gtk_widget_get_window (child_widget);
5050 if (new_event->window)
5051 g_object_ref (new_event->window);
5052 gtk_widget_realize (child_widget);
5053 handled = gtk_widget_event (child_widget, (GdkEvent *)new_event);
5054 gdk_event_free ((GdkEvent *)new_event);
5055
5056 return handled;
5057}
5058
5059static gint
5060go_to_next_page (EvView *view,
5061 gint page)
5062{
5063 int n_pages;
5064 gboolean dual_page;
5065
5066 if (!view->document)
5067 return -1;
5068
5069 n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
5070
5071 dual_page = is_dual_page (view, NULL((void*)0));
5072 page += dual_page ? 2 : 1;
5073
5074 if (page < n_pages)
5075 return page;
5076
5077 if (dual_page && page == n_pages)
5078 return page - 1;
5079
5080 return -1;
5081}
5082
5083static gint
5084go_to_previous_page (EvView *view,
5085 gint page)
5086{
5087 gboolean dual_page;
5088
5089 if (!view->document)
5090 return -1;
5091
5092 dual_page = is_dual_page (view, NULL((void*)0));
5093 page -= dual_page ? 2 : 1;
5094
5095 if (page >= 0)
5096 return page;
5097
5098 if (dual_page && page == -1)
5099 return 0;
5100
5101 return -1;
5102}
5103
5104static gboolean
5105cursor_go_to_page_start (EvView *view)
5106{
5107 view->cursor_offset = 0;
5108
5109 return TRUE(!(0));
5110}
5111
5112static gboolean
5113cursor_go_to_page_end (EvView *view)
5114{
5115 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5116 gulong n_attrs;
5117
5118 if (!view->page_cache)
5119 return FALSE(0);
5120
5121 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5122 if (!log_attrs)
5123 return FALSE(0);
5124
5125 view->cursor_offset = n_attrs;
5126
5127 return TRUE(!(0));
5128}
5129
5130static gboolean
5131cursor_go_to_next_page (EvView *view)
5132{
5133 gint new_page;
5134
5135 new_page = go_to_next_page (view, view->cursor_page);
5136 if (new_page != -1) {
5137 view->cursor_page = new_page;
5138 return cursor_go_to_page_start (view);
5139 }
5140
5141 return FALSE(0);
5142}
5143
5144static gboolean
5145cursor_go_to_previous_page (EvView *view)
5146{
5147 gint new_page;
5148
5149 new_page = go_to_previous_page (view, view->cursor_page);
5150 if (new_page != -1) {
5151 view->cursor_page = new_page;
5152 return cursor_go_to_page_end (view);
5153 }
5154 return FALSE(0);
5155}
5156
5157static gboolean
5158cursor_backward_char (EvView *view)
5159{
5160 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5161 gulong n_attrs;
5162
5163 if (!view->page_cache)
5164 return FALSE(0);
5165
5166 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5167 if (!log_attrs)
5168 return FALSE(0);
5169
5170 if (view->cursor_offset == 0)
5171 return cursor_go_to_previous_page (view);
5172
5173 do {
5174 view->cursor_offset--;
5175 } while (view->cursor_offset >= 0 && !log_attrs[view->cursor_offset].is_cursor_position);
5176
5177 return TRUE(!(0));
5178}
5179
5180static gboolean
5181cursor_forward_char (EvView *view)
5182{
5183 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5184 gulong n_attrs;
5185
5186 if (!view->page_cache)
5187 return FALSE(0);
5188
5189 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5190 if (!log_attrs)
5191 return FALSE(0);
5192
5193 if (view->cursor_offset >= n_attrs)
5194 return cursor_go_to_next_page (view);
5195
5196 do {
5197 view->cursor_offset++;
5198 } while (view->cursor_offset <= n_attrs && !log_attrs[view->cursor_offset].is_cursor_position);
5199
5200 return TRUE(!(0));
5201}
5202
5203static gboolean
5204cursor_backward_word_start (EvView *view)
5205{
5206 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5207 gulong n_attrs;
5208 gint i, j;
5209
5210 if (!view->page_cache)
5211 return FALSE(0);
5212
5213 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5214 if (!log_attrs)
5215 return FALSE(0);
5216
5217 /* Skip current word starts */
5218 for (i = view->cursor_offset; i >= 0 && log_attrs[i].is_word_start; i--);
5219 if (i <= 0) {
5220 if (cursor_go_to_previous_page (view))
5221 return cursor_backward_word_start (view);
5222 return FALSE(0);
5223 }
5224
5225 /* Move to the beginning of the word */
5226 for (j = i; j >= 0 && !log_attrs[j].is_word_start; j--);
5227 view->cursor_offset = MAX (0, j)(((0) > (j)) ? (0) : (j));
5228
5229 return TRUE(!(0));
5230}
5231
5232static gboolean
5233cursor_forward_word_end (EvView *view)
5234{
5235 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5236 gulong n_attrs;
5237 gint i, j;
5238
5239 if (!view->page_cache)
5240 return FALSE(0);
5241
5242 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5243 if (!log_attrs)
5244 return FALSE(0);
5245
5246 /* Skip current current word ends */
5247 for (i = view->cursor_offset; i < n_attrs && log_attrs[i].is_word_end; i++);
5248 if (i >= n_attrs) {
5249 if (cursor_go_to_next_page (view))
5250 return cursor_forward_word_end (view);
5251 return FALSE(0);
5252 }
5253
5254 /* Move to the end of the word. */
5255 for (j = i; j < n_attrs && !log_attrs[j].is_word_end; j++);
5256 view->cursor_offset = MIN (j, n_attrs)(((j) < (n_attrs)) ? (j) : (n_attrs));
5257
5258 return TRUE(!(0));
5259}
5260
5261static gboolean
5262cursor_go_to_line_start (EvView *view)
5263{
5264 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5265 gulong n_attrs;
5266 gint i;
5267
5268 if (!view->page_cache)
5269 return FALSE(0);
5270
5271 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5272 if (!log_attrs)
5273 return FALSE(0);
5274
5275 for (i = view->cursor_offset; i >= 0 && !log_attrs[i].is_mandatory_break; i--);
5276 view->cursor_offset = MAX (0, i)(((0) > (i)) ? (0) : (i));
5277
5278 return TRUE(!(0));
5279}
5280
5281static gboolean
5282cursor_backward_line (EvView *view)
5283{
5284 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5285 gulong n_attrs;
5286
5287 if (!cursor_go_to_line_start (view))
5288 return FALSE(0);
5289
5290 if (view->cursor_offset == 0)
5291 return cursor_go_to_previous_page (view);
5292
5293 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5294
5295 do {
5296 view->cursor_offset--;
5297 } while (view->cursor_offset >= 0 && !log_attrs[view->cursor_offset].is_mandatory_break);
5298 view->cursor_offset = MAX (0, view->cursor_offset)(((0) > (view->cursor_offset)) ? (0) : (view->cursor_offset
));
5299
5300 return TRUE(!(0));
5301}
5302
5303static gboolean
5304cursor_go_to_line_end (EvView *view)
5305{
5306 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5307 gulong n_attrs;
5308 gint i;
5309
5310 if (!view->page_cache)
5311 return FALSE(0);
5312
5313 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5314 if (!log_attrs)
5315 return FALSE(0);
5316
5317 for (i = view->cursor_offset + 1; i <= n_attrs && !log_attrs[i].is_mandatory_break; i++);
5318 view->cursor_offset = MIN (i, n_attrs)(((i) < (n_attrs)) ? (i) : (n_attrs));
5319
5320 if (view->cursor_offset == n_attrs)
5321 return TRUE(!(0));
5322
5323 do {
5324 view->cursor_offset--;
5325 } while (view->cursor_offset >= 0 && !log_attrs[view->cursor_offset].is_cursor_position);
5326
5327 return TRUE(!(0));
5328}
5329
5330static gboolean
5331cursor_forward_line (EvView *view)
5332{
5333 PangoLogAttr *log_attrs = NULL((void*)0);
5334 gulong n_attrs;
5335
5336 if (!cursor_go_to_line_end (view))
5337 return FALSE(0);
5338
5339 ev_page_cache_get_text_log_attrs (view->page_cache, view->cursor_page, &log_attrs, &n_attrs);
5340
5341 if (view->cursor_offset == n_attrs)
5342 return cursor_go_to_next_page (view);
5343
5344 do {
5345 view->cursor_offset++;
5346 } while (view->cursor_offset <= n_attrs && !log_attrs[view->cursor_offset].is_cursor_position);
5347
5348 return TRUE(!(0));
5349}
5350
5351static void
5352extend_selection (EvView *view,
5353 GdkPoint *start_point,
5354 GdkPoint *end_point)
5355{
5356 if (!view->selection_info.selections) {
5357 view->selection_info.start.x = start_point->x;
5358 view->selection_info.start.y = start_point->y;
5359 }
5360
5361 compute_selections (view,
5362 EV_SELECTION_STYLE_GLYPH,
5363 &(view->selection_info.start),
5364 end_point);
5365}
5366
5367static gboolean
5368cursor_clear_selection (EvView *view,
5369 gboolean forward)
5370{
5371 GList *l;
5372 EvViewSelection *selection;
5373 cairo_rectangle_int_t rect;
5374 gint doc_x, doc_y;
5375
5376 /* When clearing the selection, move the cursor to
5377 * the limits of the selection region.
5378 */
5379 if (!view->selection_info.selections)
5380 return FALSE(0);
5381
5382 l = forward ? g_list_last (view->selection_info.selections) : view->selection_info.selections;
5383 selection = (EvViewSelection *)l->data;
5384 if (!selection->covered_region || cairo_region_is_empty (selection->covered_region))
5385 return FALSE(0);
5386
5387 cairo_region_get_rectangle (selection->covered_region,
5388 forward ? cairo_region_num_rectangles (selection->covered_region) - 1 : 0,
5389 &rect);
5390
5391 if (!get_doc_point_from_offset (view, selection->page,
5392 forward ? rect.x + rect.width : rect.x,
5393 rect.y + (rect.height / 2), &doc_x, &doc_y))
5394 return FALSE(0);
5395
5396 position_caret_cursor_at_doc_point (view, selection->page, doc_x, doc_y);
5397 return TRUE(!(0));
5398}
5399
5400static gboolean
5401ev_view_move_cursor (EvView *view,
5402 GtkMovementStep step,
5403 gint count,
5404 gboolean extend_selections)
5405{
5406 GdkRectangle rect;
5407 GdkRectangle prev_rect;
5408 gint prev_offset;
5409 gint prev_page;
5410 cairo_region_t *damage_region;
5411 gboolean clear_selections = FALSE(0);
5412 const gboolean forward = count >= 0;
5413
5414 if (!view->caret_enabled || view->rotation != 0)
5415 return FALSE(0);
5416
5417 view->key_binding_handled = TRUE(!(0));
5418 view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
5419
5420 prev_offset = view->cursor_offset;
5421 prev_page = view->cursor_page;
5422
5423 clear_selections = !extend_selections && view->selection_info.selections != NULL((void*)0);
5424
5425 switch (step) {
5426 case GTK_MOVEMENT_VISUAL_POSITIONS:
5427 if (!clear_selections || !cursor_clear_selection (view, count > 0)) {
5428 while (count > 0) {
5429 cursor_forward_char (view);
5430 count--;
5431 }
5432 while (count < 0) {
5433 cursor_backward_char (view);
5434 count++;
5435 }
5436 }
5437 break;
5438 case GTK_MOVEMENT_WORDS:
5439 while (count > 0) {
5440 cursor_forward_word_end (view);
5441 count--;
5442 }
5443 while (count < 0) {
5444 cursor_backward_word_start (view);
5445 count++;
5446 }
5447 break;
5448 case GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES:
5449 while (count > 0) {
5450 cursor_forward_line (view);
5451 count--;
5452 }
5453 while (count < 0) {
5454 cursor_backward_line (view);
5455 count++;
5456 }
5457 break;
5458 case GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINE_ENDS:
5459 if (count > 0)
5460 cursor_go_to_line_end (view);
5461 else if (count < 0)
5462 cursor_go_to_line_start (view);
5463 break;
5464 default:
5465 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 5465
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
5466 }
5467
5468 ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
5469
5470 /* Notify the user that it was not possible to move the caret cursor */
5471 if (!clear_selections &&
5472 prev_offset == view->cursor_offset && prev_page == view->cursor_page) {
5473 gtk_widget_error_bell (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
5474 return TRUE(!(0));
5475 }
5476
5477 /* Scroll to make the caret visible */
5478 if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &rect))
5479 return TRUE(!(0));
5480
5481 if (step == GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES) {
5482 const gint prev_cursor_offset = view->cursor_offset;
5483
5484 position_caret_cursor_at_location (view,
5485 MAX (rect.x, view->cursor_line_offset)(((rect.x) > (view->cursor_line_offset)) ? (rect.x) : (
view->cursor_line_offset)),
5486 rect.y + (rect.height / 2));
5487 /* Make sure we didn't move the cursor in the wrong direction
5488 * in case the visual order isn't the same as the logical one,
5489 * in order to avoid cursor movement loops */
5490 if ((forward && prev_cursor_offset > view->cursor_offset) ||
5491 (!forward && prev_cursor_offset < view->cursor_offset)) {
5492 view->cursor_offset = prev_cursor_offset;
5493 }
5494 if (!clear_selections &&
5495 prev_offset == view->cursor_offset && prev_page == view->cursor_page) {
5496 gtk_widget_error_bell (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
5497 return TRUE(!(0));
5498 }
5499
5500 if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &rect))
5501 return TRUE(!(0));
5502 } else {
5503 view->cursor_line_offset = rect.x;
5504 }
5505
5506 damage_region = cairo_region_create_rectangle (&rect);
5507 if (get_caret_cursor_area (view, prev_page, prev_offset, &prev_rect))
5508 cairo_region_union_rectangle (damage_region, &prev_rect);
5509
5510 rect.x += view->scroll_x;
5511 rect.y += view->scroll_y;
5512
5513 ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, view->cursor_page);
5514 ensure_rectangle_is_visible (view, &rect);
5515
5516 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_CURSOR_MOVED], 0, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset);
5517
5518 gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
5519 damage_region, TRUE(!(0)));
5520 cairo_region_destroy (damage_region);
5521
5522 /* Select text */
5523 if (extend_selections && EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_selection_get_type ())
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) {
5524 GdkPoint start_point, end_point;
5525
5526 start_point.x = prev_rect.x + view->scroll_x;
5527 start_point.y = prev_rect.y + (prev_rect.height / 2) + view->scroll_y;
5528
5529 end_point.x = rect.x;
5530 end_point.y = rect.y + rect.height / 2;
5531
5532 extend_selection (view, &start_point, &end_point);
5533 } else if (clear_selections)
5534 clear_selection (view);
5535
5536 return TRUE(!(0));
5537}
5538
5539static gboolean
5540ev_view_key_press_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5541 GdkEventKey *event)
5542{
5543 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5544 gboolean retval;
5545
5546 if (!view->document)
5547 return FALSE(0);
5548
5549 if (!gtk_widget_has_focus (widget))
5550 return ev_view_forward_key_event_to_focused_child (view, event);
5551
5552 /* I expected GTK+ do this for me, but it doesn't cancel
5553 * the propagation of bindings handled for the same binding set
5554 */
5555 view->key_binding_handled = FALSE(0);
5556 retval = gtk_bindings_activate_event (G_OBJECT (widget)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
widget)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), event);
5557 view->key_binding_handled = FALSE(0);
5558
5559 return retval;
5560}
5561
5562static gint
5563ev_view_focus_in (GtkWidget *widget,
5564 GdkEventFocus *event)
5565{
5566 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5567
5568 if (view->pixbuf_cache)
5569 ev_pixbuf_cache_style_changed (view->pixbuf_cache);
5570
5571 ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
5572 gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
5573
5574 return FALSE(0);
5575}
5576
5577static gint
5578ev_view_focus_out (GtkWidget *widget,
5579 GdkEventFocus *event)
5580{
5581 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5582
5583 if (view->pixbuf_cache)
5584 ev_pixbuf_cache_style_changed (view->pixbuf_cache);
5585
5586 ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
5587 gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
5588
5589 return FALSE(0);
5590}
5591
5592static gboolean
5593ev_view_leave_notify_event (GtkWidget *widget, GdkEventCrossing *event)
5594{
5595 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5596
5597 if (view->cursor != EV_VIEW_CURSOR_NORMAL)
5598 ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_NORMAL);
5599
5600 return FALSE(0);
5601}
5602
5603static gboolean
5604ev_view_enter_notify_event (GtkWidget *widget, GdkEventCrossing *event)
5605{
5606 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5607
5608 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, event->x, event->y);
5609
5610 return FALSE(0);
5611}
5612
5613static void
5614ev_view_style_updated (GtkWidget *widget)
5615{
5616 if (EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))))->pixbuf_cache)
5617 ev_pixbuf_cache_style_changed (EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))))->pixbuf_cache);
5618
5619 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (ev_view_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*) (
(ev_view_parent_class)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))->style_updated (widget);
5620}
5621
5622/*** Drawing ***/
5623
5624
5625static void
5626draw_rubberband (EvView *view,
5627 cairo_t *cr,
5628 const GdkRectangle *rect,
5629 gdouble alpha)
5630{
5631 GtkStyleContext *context;
5632 GdkRGBA color;
5633
5634 context = gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
5635 gtk_style_context_save (context);
5636 gtk_style_context_get_background_color (context, GTK_STATE_FLAG_SELECTED, &color);
5637 gtk_style_context_restore (context);
5638
5639 cairo_save (cr);
5640
5641 cairo_set_source_rgba (cr, color.red, color.green, color.blue, alpha);
5642 cairo_rectangle (cr,
5643 rect->x - view->scroll_x,
5644 rect->y - view->scroll_y,
5645 rect->width, rect->height);
5646 cairo_fill_preserve (cr);
5647
5648 cairo_set_line_width (cr, 0.5);
5649 cairo_set_source_rgb (cr, color.red, color.green, color.blue);
5650 cairo_stroke (cr);
5651
5652 cairo_restore (cr);
5653}
5654
5655
5656static void
5657highlight_find_results (EvView *view, cairo_t *cr, int page)
5658{
5659 gint i, n_results = 0;
5660
5661 n_results = ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, page);
5662
5663 for (i = 0; i < n_results; i++) {
5664 EvRectangle *rectangle;
5665 GdkRectangle view_rectangle;
5666 gdouble alpha;
5667
5668 if (i == view->find_result && page == view->current_page) {
5669 alpha = 0.6;
5670 } else {
5671 alpha = 0.3;
5672 }
5673
5674 rectangle = ev_view_find_get_result (view, page, i);
5675 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, rectangle, &view_rectangle);
5676 draw_rubberband (view, cr, &view_rectangle, alpha);
5677 }
5678}
5679
5680#ifdef ENABLE_SYNCTEX1
5681static void
5682highlight_forward_search_results (EvView *view, cairo_t *cr, int page)
5683{
5684 GdkRectangle rect;
5685 EvMapping *mapping = view->synctex_result;
5686
5687 if (GPOINTER_TO_INT (mapping->data)((gint) (glong) (mapping->data)) != page)
5688 return;
5689
5690 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, &mapping->area, &rect);
5691
5692 cairo_save (cr);
5693 cairo_set_source_rgb (cr, 1., 0., 0.);
5694 cairo_rectangle (cr,
5695 rect.x - view->scroll_x,
5696 rect.y - view->scroll_y,
5697 rect.width, rect.height);
5698 cairo_stroke (cr);
5699 cairo_restore (cr);
5700}
5701#endif
5702
5703static void
5704draw_surface (cairo_t *cr,
5705 cairo_surface_t *surface,
5706 gint x,
5707 gint y,
5708 gint offset_x,
5709 gint offset_y,
5710 gint target_width,
5711 gint target_height)
5712{
5713 gdouble width, height;
5714 gdouble device_scale_x = 1, device_scale_y = 1;
5715
5716 cairo_surface_get_device_scale (surface, &device_scale_x, &device_scale_y);
5717 width = cairo_image_surface_get_width (surface) / device_scale_x;
5718 height = cairo_image_surface_get_height (surface) / device_scale_y;
5719
5720 cairo_save (cr);
5721 cairo_translate (cr, x, y);
5722
5723 if (width != target_width || height != target_height) {
5724 gdouble scale_x, scale_y;
5725
5726 scale_x = (gdouble)target_width / width;
5727 scale_y = (gdouble)target_height / height;
5728 cairo_pattern_set_filter (cairo_get_source (cr),
5729 CAIRO_FILTER_FAST);
5730 cairo_scale (cr, scale_x, scale_y);
5731
5732 offset_x /= scale_x;
5733 offset_y /= scale_y;
5734 }
5735
5736 cairo_surface_set_device_offset (surface,
5737 offset_x * device_scale_x,
5738 offset_y * device_scale_y);
5739 cairo_set_source_surface (cr, surface, 0, 0);
5740 cairo_paint (cr);
5741 cairo_restore (cr);
5742}
5743
5744void
5745_ev_view_get_selection_colors (EvView *view,
5746 GdkRGBA *bg_color,
5747 GdkRGBA *fg_color)
5748{
5749 GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))));
5750 GtkStateFlags state;
5751 GtkStyleContext *context;
5752
5753 state = gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) ? GTK_STATE_FLAG_SELECTED : GTK_STATE_FLAG_ACTIVE;
5754 context = gtk_widget_get_style_context (widget);
5755 gtk_style_context_save (context);
5756
5757 if (bg_color)
5758 gtk_style_context_get_background_color (context, state, bg_color);
5759
5760 if (fg_color)
5761 gtk_style_context_get_color (context, state, fg_color);
5762
5763 gtk_style_context_restore (context);
5764}
5765
5766static void
5767draw_selection_region (cairo_t *cr,
5768 cairo_region_t *region,
5769 GdkRGBA *color,
5770 gint x,
5771 gint y,
5772 gdouble scale_x,
5773 gdouble scale_y)
5774{
5775 cairo_save (cr);
5776 cairo_translate (cr, x, y);
5777 cairo_scale (cr, scale_x, scale_y);
5778 gdk_cairo_region (cr, region);
5779 cairo_set_source_rgb (cr, color->red, color->green, color->blue);
5780 cairo_set_operator (cr, CAIRO_OPERATOR_MULTIPLY);
5781 cairo_set_antialias (cr, CAIRO_ANTIALIAS_NONE);
5782 cairo_fill (cr);
5783 cairo_restore (cr);
5784}
5785
5786static void
5787draw_one_page (EvView *view,
5788 gint page,
5789 cairo_t *cr,
5790 GdkRectangle *page_area,
5791 GtkBorder *border,
5792 GdkRectangle *expose_area,
5793 gboolean *page_ready)
5794{
5795 GtkStyleContext *context;
5796 GdkRectangle overlap;
5797 GdkRectangle real_page_area;
5798 gint current_page;
5799
5800 g_assert (view->document)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (view->document) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_
= 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 5800, ((const char*) (__func__)),
"view->document"); } while (0);
5801
5802 if (! gdk_rectangle_intersect (page_area, expose_area, &overlap))
5803 return;
5804
5805 /* Render the document itself */
5806 real_page_area = *page_area;
5807
5808 real_page_area.x += border->left;
5809 real_page_area.y += border->top;
5810 real_page_area.width -= (border->left + border->right);
5811 real_page_area.height -= (border->top + border->bottom);
5812 *page_ready = TRUE(!(0));
5813
5814 context = gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
5815 current_page = ev_document_model_get_page (view->model);
5816
5817 gtk_style_context_save (context);
5818 gtk_style_context_add_class (context, EV_STYLE_CLASS_DOCUMENT_PAGE"document-page");
5819 if (ev_document_model_get_inverted_colors (view->model))
5820 gtk_style_context_add_class (context, EV_STYLE_CLASS_INVERTED"inverted");
5821
5822 if (view->continuous && page == current_page)
5823 gtk_style_context_set_state (context, GTK_STATE_FLAG_ACTIVE);
5824
5825 gtk_render_background (context, cr, page_area->x, page_area->y, page_area->width, page_area->height);
5826 gtk_render_frame (context, cr, page_area->x, page_area->y, page_area->width, page_area->height);
5827 gtk_style_context_restore (context);
5828
5829 if (gdk_rectangle_intersect (&real_page_area, expose_area, &overlap)) {
5830 gint width, height;
5831 cairo_surface_t *page_surface = NULL((void*)0);
5832 cairo_surface_t *selection_surface = NULL((void*)0);
5833 gint offset_x, offset_y;
5834 cairo_region_t *region = NULL((void*)0);
5835
5836 page_surface = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_surface (view->pixbuf_cache, page);
5837
5838 if (!page_surface) {
5839 if (page == current_page)
5840 ev_view_set_loading (view, TRUE(!(0)));
5841
5842 *page_ready = FALSE(0);
5843
5844 return;
5845 }
5846
5847 if (page == current_page)
5848 ev_view_set_loading (view, FALSE(0));
5849
5850 ev_view_get_page_size (view, page, &width, &height);
5851 offset_x = overlap.x - real_page_area.x;
5852 offset_y = overlap.y - real_page_area.y;
5853
5854 draw_surface (cr, page_surface, overlap.x, overlap.y, offset_x, offset_y, width, height);
5855
5856 /* Get the selection pixbuf iff we have something to draw */
5857 if (!find_selection_for_page (view, page))
5858 return;
5859
5860 selection_surface = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_surface (view->pixbuf_cache,
5861 page,
5862 view->scale);
5863 if (selection_surface) {
5864 draw_surface (cr, selection_surface, overlap.x, overlap.y, offset_x, offset_y,
5865 width, height);
5866 return;
5867 }
5868
5869 region = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_region (view->pixbuf_cache,
5870 page,
5871 view->scale);
5872 if (region) {
5873 double scale_x, scale_y;
5874 GdkRGBA color;
5875 double device_scale_x = 1, device_scale_y = 1;
5876
5877 scale_x = (gdouble)width / cairo_image_surface_get_width (page_surface);
5878 scale_y = (gdouble)height / cairo_image_surface_get_height (page_surface);
5879
5880 cairo_surface_get_device_scale (page_surface, &device_scale_x, &device_scale_y);
5881
5882 scale_x *= device_scale_x;
5883 scale_y *= device_scale_y;
5884
5885 _ev_view_get_selection_colors (view, &color, NULL((void*)0));
5886 draw_selection_region (cr, region, &color, real_page_area.x, real_page_area.y,
5887 scale_x, scale_y);
5888 }
5889 }
5890}
5891
5892/*** GObject functions ***/
5893
5894static void
5895ev_view_finalize (GObject *object)
5896{
5897 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (object)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((object
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5898
5899 if (view->selection_info.selections) {
5900 g_list_free_full (view->selection_info.selections, (GDestroyNotify)selection_free);
5901 view->selection_info.selections = NULL((void*)0);
5902 }
5903 clear_link_selected (view);
5904
5905 if (view->synctex_result) {
5906 g_free (view->synctex_result);
5907 view->synctex_result = NULL((void*)0);
5908 }
5909
5910 if (view->image_dnd_info.image)
5911 g_object_unref (view->image_dnd_info.image);
5912 view->image_dnd_info.image = NULL((void*)0);
5913
5914 g_object_unref (view->zoom_gesture);
5915
5916 G_OBJECT_CLASS (ev_view_parent_class)((((GObjectClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*) ((ev_view_parent_class
)), (((GType) ((20) << (2))))))))->finalize (object);
5917}
5918
5919static void
5920ev_view_dispose (GObject *object)
5921{
5922 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (object)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((object
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5923
5924 if (view->model) {
5925 g_object_unref (view->model);
5926 view->model = NULL((void*)0);
5927 }
5928
5929 if (view->pixbuf_cache) {
5930 g_object_unref (view->pixbuf_cache);
5931 view->pixbuf_cache = NULL((void*)0);
5932 }
5933
5934 if (view->document) {
5935 g_object_unref (view->document);
5936 view->document = NULL((void*)0);
5937 }
5938
5939 if (view->page_cache) {
5940 g_object_unref (view->page_cache);
5941 view->page_cache = NULL((void*)0);
5942 }
5943
5944 ev_view_window_children_free (view);
5945
5946 if (view->selection_scroll_id) {
5947 g_source_remove (view->selection_scroll_id);
5948 view->selection_scroll_id = 0;
5949 }
5950
5951 if (view->selection_update_id) {
5952 g_source_remove (view->selection_update_id);
5953 view->selection_update_id = 0;
5954 }
5955
5956 if (view->scroll_info.timeout_id) {
5957 g_source_remove (view->scroll_info.timeout_id);
5958 view->scroll_info.timeout_id = 0;
5959 }
5960
5961 if (view->drag_info.drag_timeout_id) {
5962 g_source_remove (view->drag_info.drag_timeout_id);
5963 view->drag_info.drag_timeout_id = 0;
5964 }
5965
5966 if (view->drag_info.release_timeout_id) {
5967 g_source_remove (view->drag_info.release_timeout_id);
5968 view->drag_info.release_timeout_id = 0;
5969 }
5970
5971 if (view->cursor_blink_timeout_id) {
5972 g_source_remove (view->cursor_blink_timeout_id);
5973 view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = 0;
5974 }
5975
5976 g_clear_object(&view->accessible)do { _Static_assert (sizeof *((&view->accessible)) == sizeof
(gpointer), "Expression evaluates to false"); union { char *
in; gpointer *out; } _pp; gpointer _p; GDestroyNotify _destroy
= (GDestroyNotify) (g_object_unref); _pp.in = (char *) ((&
view->accessible)); _p = *_pp.out; if (_p) { *_pp.out = ((
void*)0); _destroy (_p); } } while (0);
5977
5978 G_OBJECT_CLASS (ev_view_parent_class)((((GObjectClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*) ((ev_view_parent_class
)), (((GType) ((20) << (2))))))))->dispose (object);
5979}
5980
5981static void
5982ev_view_get_property (GObject *object,
5983 guint prop_id,
5984 GValue *value,
5985 GParamSpec *pspec)
5986{
5987 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (object)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((object
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
5988
5989 switch (prop_id) {
5990 case PROP_IS_LOADING:
5991 g_value_set_boolean (value, view->loading);
5992 break;
5993 case PROP_HADJUSTMENT:
5994 g_value_set_object (value, view->hadjustment);
5995 break;
5996 case PROP_VADJUSTMENT:
5997 g_value_set_object (value, view->vadjustment);
5998 break;
5999 case PROP_HSCROLL_POLICY:
6000 g_value_set_enum (value, view->hscroll_policy);
6001 break;
6002 case PROP_VSCROLL_POLICY:
6003 g_value_set_enum (value, view->vscroll_policy);
6004 break;
6005 default:
6006 G_OBJECT_WARN_INVALID_PROPERTY_ID (object, prop_id, pspec)do { GObject *_glib__object = (GObject*) ((object)); GParamSpec
*_glib__pspec = (GParamSpec*) ((pspec)); guint _glib__property_id
= ((prop_id)); g_warning ("%s:%d: invalid %s id %u for \"%s\" of type '%s' in '%s'"
, "ev-view.c", 6006, ("property"), _glib__property_id, _glib__pspec
->name, g_type_name ((((((GTypeClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) (
_glib__pspec))->g_class))->g_type)))), (g_type_name (((
(((GTypeClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) (_glib__object))->g_class
))->g_type)))))); } while (0);
6007 break;
6008 }
6009}
6010
6011static void
6012ev_view_set_property (GObject *object,
6013 guint prop_id,
6014 const GValue *value,
6015 GParamSpec *pspec)
6016{
6017 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (object)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((object
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
6018
6019 switch (prop_id) {
6020 case PROP_IS_LOADING:
6021 ev_view_set_loading (view, g_value_get_boolean (value));
6022 break;
6023 case PROP_HADJUSTMENT:
6024 set_scroll_adjustment (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL,
6025 (GtkAdjustment *) g_value_get_object (value));
6026 break;
6027 case PROP_VADJUSTMENT:
6028 set_scroll_adjustment (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL,
6029 (GtkAdjustment *) g_value_get_object (value));
6030 break;
6031 case PROP_HSCROLL_POLICY:
6032 view->hscroll_policy = g_value_get_enum (value);
6033 gtk_widget_queue_resize (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6034 break;
6035 case PROP_VSCROLL_POLICY:
6036 view->vscroll_policy = g_value_get_enum (value);
6037 gtk_widget_queue_resize (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6038 break;
6039 default:
6040 G_OBJECT_WARN_INVALID_PROPERTY_ID (object, prop_id, pspec)do { GObject *_glib__object = (GObject*) ((object)); GParamSpec
*_glib__pspec = (GParamSpec*) ((pspec)); guint _glib__property_id
= ((prop_id)); g_warning ("%s:%d: invalid %s id %u for \"%s\" of type '%s' in '%s'"
, "ev-view.c", 6040, ("property"), _glib__property_id, _glib__pspec
->name, g_type_name ((((((GTypeClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) (
_glib__pspec))->g_class))->g_type)))), (g_type_name (((
(((GTypeClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) (_glib__object))->g_class
))->g_type)))))); } while (0);
6041 break;
6042 }
6043}
6044
6045/* Accessibility */
6046static AtkObject *
6047ev_view_get_accessible (GtkWidget *widget)
6048{
6049 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
6050
6051 if (!view->accessible)
6052 view->accessible = ev_view_accessible_new (widget);
6053 return view->accessible;
6054}
6055
6056/* GtkContainer */
6057static void
6058ev_view_remove (GtkContainer *container,
6059 GtkWidget *widget)
6060{
6061 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (container)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((container
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
6062 GList *tmp_list = view->children;
6063 EvViewChild *child;
6064
6065 while (tmp_list) {
6066 child = tmp_list->data;
6067
6068 if (child->widget == widget) {
6069 gtk_widget_unparent (widget);
6070
6071 view->children = g_list_remove_link (view->children, tmp_list);
6072 g_list_free_1 (tmp_list);
6073 g_slice_free (EvViewChild, child)do { if (1) g_slice_free1 (sizeof (EvViewChild), (child)); else
(void) ((EvViewChild*) 0 == (child)); } while (0);
6074
6075 return;
6076 }
6077
6078 tmp_list = tmp_list->next;
6079 }
6080}
6081
6082static void
6083ev_view_forall (GtkContainer *container,
6084 gboolean include_internals,
6085 GtkCallback callback,
6086 gpointer callback_data)
6087{
6088 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (container)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((container
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
6089 GList *tmp_list = view->children;
6090 EvViewChild *child;
6091
6092 while (tmp_list) {
6093 child = tmp_list->data;
6094 tmp_list = tmp_list->next;
6095
6096 (* callback) (child->widget, callback_data);
6097 }
6098}
6099
6100static void
6101pan_gesture_pan_cb (GtkGesturePan *gesture,
6102 GtkPanDirection direction,
6103 gdouble offset,
6104 EvView *view)
6105{
6106 GtkAllocation allocation;
6107
6108 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &allocation);
6109
6110 if (view->continuous ||
6111 allocation.width < view->requisition.width) {
6112 gtk_gesture_set_state (GTK_GESTURE (gesture)((((GtkGesture*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*)
((gesture)), ((gtk_gesture_get_type ())))))),
6113 GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED);
6114 return;
6115 }
6116
6117#define PAN_ACTION_DISTANCE 200
6118
6119 view->pan_action = EV_PAN_ACTION_NONE;
6120 gtk_gesture_set_state (GTK_GESTURE (gesture)((((GtkGesture*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*)
((gesture)), ((gtk_gesture_get_type ())))))), GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_CLAIMED);
6121
6122 if (offset > PAN_ACTION_DISTANCE) {
6123 if (direction == GTK_PAN_DIRECTION_LEFT ||
6124 gtk_widget_get_direction (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))) == GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL)
6125 view->pan_action = EV_PAN_ACTION_NEXT;
6126 else
6127 view->pan_action = EV_PAN_ACTION_PREV;
6128 }
6129#undef PAN_ACTION_DISTANCE
6130}
6131
6132static void
6133pan_gesture_end_cb (GtkGesture *gesture,
6134 GdkEventSequence *sequence,
6135 EvView *view)
6136{
6137 if (!gtk_gesture_handles_sequence (gesture, sequence))
6138 return;
6139
6140 if (view->pan_action == EV_PAN_ACTION_PREV)
6141 ev_view_previous_page (view);
6142 else if (view->pan_action == EV_PAN_ACTION_NEXT)
6143 ev_view_next_page (view);
6144
6145 view->pan_action = EV_PAN_ACTION_NONE;
6146}
6147
6148static void
6149ev_view_hierarchy_changed (GtkWidget *widget,
6150 GtkWidget *previous_toplevel)
6151{
6152 GtkWidget *parent = gtk_widget_get_parent (widget);
6153 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((widget
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
6154
6155 if (parent && !view->pan_gesture) {
6156 view->pan_gesture =
6157 gtk_gesture_pan_new (parent, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
6158 g_signal_connect (view->pan_gesture, "pan",g_signal_connect_data ((view->pan_gesture), ("pan"), (((GCallback
) (pan_gesture_pan_cb))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
6159 G_CALLBACK (pan_gesture_pan_cb), widget)g_signal_connect_data ((view->pan_gesture), ("pan"), (((GCallback
) (pan_gesture_pan_cb))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
6160 g_signal_connect (view->pan_gesture, "end",g_signal_connect_data ((view->pan_gesture), ("end"), (((GCallback
) (pan_gesture_end_cb))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
6161 G_CALLBACK (pan_gesture_end_cb), widget)g_signal_connect_data ((view->pan_gesture), ("end"), (((GCallback
) (pan_gesture_end_cb))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
6162
6163 gtk_gesture_single_set_touch_only (GTK_GESTURE_SINGLE (view->pan_gesture)((((GtkGestureSingle*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->pan_gesture)), ((gtk_gesture_single_get_type ()
)))))), TRUE(!(0)));
6164 gtk_event_controller_set_propagation_phase (GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER (view->pan_gesture)((((GtkEventController*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->pan_gesture)), ((gtk_event_controller_get_type (
))))))),
6165 GTK_PHASE_CAPTURE);
6166 } else if (!parent && view->pan_gesture) {
6167 g_clear_object (&view->pan_gesture)do { _Static_assert (sizeof *((&view->pan_gesture)) ==
sizeof (gpointer), "Expression evaluates to false"); union {
char *in; gpointer *out; } _pp; gpointer _p; GDestroyNotify _destroy
= (GDestroyNotify) (g_object_unref); _pp.in = (char *) ((&
view->pan_gesture)); _p = *_pp.out; if (_p) { *_pp.out = (
(void*)0); _destroy (_p); } } while (0);
6168 }
6169}
6170
6171static void
6172ev_view_parent_set (GtkWidget *widget,
6173 GtkWidget *previous_parent)
6174{
6175 GtkWidget *parent;
6176
6177 parent = gtk_widget_get_parent (widget);
6178 g_assert (!parent || GTK_IS_SCROLLED_WINDOW (parent))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (!parent || (((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (
GTypeInstance*) ((parent)); GType __t = ((gtk_scrolled_window_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c"
, 6178, ((const char*) (__func__)), "!parent || GTK_IS_SCROLLED_WINDOW (parent)"
); } while (0);
6179}
6180
6181static void
6182add_move_binding_keypad (GtkBindingSet *binding_set,
6183 guint keyval,
6184 GdkModifierType modifiers,
6185 GtkMovementStep step,
6186 gint count)
6187{
6188 guint keypad_keyval = keyval - GDK_KEY_Left0xff51 + GDK_KEY_KP_Left0xff96;
6189
6190 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, keyval, modifiers,
6191 "move-cursor", 3,
6192 GTK_TYPE_MOVEMENT_STEP(gtk_movement_step_get_type ()), step,
6193 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))), count,
6194 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), FALSE(0));
6195 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, keypad_keyval, modifiers,
6196 "move-cursor", 3,
6197 GTK_TYPE_MOVEMENT_STEP(gtk_movement_step_get_type ()), step,
6198 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))), count,
6199 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), FALSE(0));
6200
6201 /* Selection-extending version */
6202 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, keyval, modifiers | GDK_SHIFT_MASK,
6203 "move-cursor", 3,
6204 GTK_TYPE_MOVEMENT_STEP(gtk_movement_step_get_type ()), step,
6205 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))), count,
6206 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), TRUE(!(0)));
6207 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, keypad_keyval, modifiers | GDK_SHIFT_MASK,
6208 "move-cursor", 3,
6209 GTK_TYPE_MOVEMENT_STEP(gtk_movement_step_get_type ()), step,
6210 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))), count,
6211 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), TRUE(!(0)));
6212}
6213
6214static void
6215ev_view_class_init (EvViewClass *class)
6216{
6217 GObjectClass *object_class = G_OBJECT_CLASS (class)((((GObjectClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*) ((class
)), (((GType) ((20) << (2))))))));
6218 GtkWidgetClass *widget_class = GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*) (
(class)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))));
6219 GtkContainerClass *container_class = GTK_CONTAINER_CLASS (class)((((GtkContainerClass*) g_type_check_class_cast ((GTypeClass*
) ((class)), ((gtk_container_get_type ()))))));
6220 GtkBindingSet *binding_set;
6221
6222 object_class->get_property = ev_view_get_property;
6223 object_class->set_property = ev_view_set_property;
6224 object_class->finalize = ev_view_finalize;
6225
6226 widget_class->realize = ev_view_realize;
6227 widget_class->draw = ev_view_draw;
6228 widget_class->button_press_event = ev_view_button_press_event;
6229 widget_class->motion_notify_event = ev_view_motion_notify_event;
6230 widget_class->button_release_event = ev_view_button_release_event;
6231 widget_class->key_press_event = ev_view_key_press_event;
6232 widget_class->focus_in_event = ev_view_focus_in;
6233 widget_class->focus_out_event = ev_view_focus_out;
6234 widget_class->get_accessible = ev_view_get_accessible;
6235 widget_class->get_preferred_width = ev_view_get_preferred_width;
6236 widget_class->get_preferred_height = ev_view_get_preferred_height;
6237 widget_class->size_allocate = ev_view_size_allocate;
6238 widget_class->scroll_event = ev_view_scroll_event;
6239 widget_class->enter_notify_event = ev_view_enter_notify_event;
6240 widget_class->leave_notify_event = ev_view_leave_notify_event;
6241 widget_class->style_updated = ev_view_style_updated;
6242 widget_class->drag_data_get = ev_view_drag_data_get;
6243 widget_class->drag_motion = ev_view_drag_motion;
6244 widget_class->popup_menu = ev_view_popup_menu;
6245 widget_class->query_tooltip = ev_view_query_tooltip;
6246 widget_class->parent_set = ev_view_parent_set;
6247 widget_class->hierarchy_changed = ev_view_hierarchy_changed;
6248
6249 object_class->dispose = ev_view_dispose;
6250
6251 gtk_widget_class_set_css_name (widget_class, "evview");
6252
6253 container_class->remove = ev_view_remove;
6254 container_class->forall = ev_view_forall;
6255
6256 class->scroll = ev_view_scroll_internal;
6257 class->move_cursor = ev_view_move_cursor;
6258
6259 g_object_class_install_property (object_class,
6260 PROP_IS_LOADING,
6261 g_param_spec_boolean ("is-loading",
6262 "Is Loading",
6263 "Whether the view is loading",
6264 FALSE(0),
6265 G_PARAM_READABLE |
6266 G_PARAM_STATIC_STRINGS(G_PARAM_STATIC_NAME | G_PARAM_STATIC_NICK | G_PARAM_STATIC_BLURB
)));
6267
6268 /* Scrollable interface */
6269 g_object_class_override_property (object_class, PROP_HADJUSTMENT, "hadjustment");
6270 g_object_class_override_property (object_class, PROP_VADJUSTMENT, "vadjustment");
6271 g_object_class_override_property (object_class, PROP_HSCROLL_POLICY, "hscroll-policy");
6272 g_object_class_override_property (object_class, PROP_VSCROLL_POLICY, "vscroll-policy");
6273
6274 signals[SIGNAL_SCROLL] = g_signal_new ("scroll",
6275 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6276 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6277 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, scroll)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, scroll)),
6278 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6279 ev_view_marshal_VOID__ENUM_ENUM,
6280 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 2,
6281 GTK_TYPE_SCROLL_TYPE(gtk_scroll_type_get_type ()),
6282 GTK_TYPE_ORIENTATION(gtk_orientation_get_type ()));
6283 signals[SIGNAL_HANDLE_LINK] = g_signal_new ("handle-link",
6284 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6285 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6286 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, handle_link)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, handle_link)),
6287 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6288 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__OBJECT,
6289 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1,
6290 G_TYPE_OBJECT((GType) ((20) << (2))));
6291 signals[SIGNAL_EXTERNAL_LINK] = g_signal_new ("external-link",
6292 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6293 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6294 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, external_link)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, external_link)),
6295 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6296 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__OBJECT,
6297 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1,
6298 G_TYPE_OBJECT((GType) ((20) << (2))));
6299 signals[SIGNAL_POPUP_MENU] = g_signal_new ("popup",
6300 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6301 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6302 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, popup_menu)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, popup_menu)),
6303 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6304 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__POINTER,
6305 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1,
6306 G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))));
6307 signals[SIGNAL_SELECTION_CHANGED] = g_signal_new ("selection-changed",
6308 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6309 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6310 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, selection_changed)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, selection_changed)),
6311 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6312 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__VOID,
6313 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 0,
6314 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))));
6315 signals[SIGNAL_SYNC_SOURCE] = g_signal_new ("sync-source",
6316 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6317 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6318 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, sync_source)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, sync_source)),
6319 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6320 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__POINTER,
6321 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1,
6322 G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))));
6323 signals[SIGNAL_ANNOT_ADDED] = g_signal_new ("annot-added",
6324 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6325 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6326 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, annot_added)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, annot_added)),
6327 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6328 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__OBJECT,
6329 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1,
6330 EV_TYPE_ANNOTATION(ev_annotation_get_type()));
6331 signals[SIGNAL_ANNOT_REMOVED] = g_signal_new ("annot-removed",
6332 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6333 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6334 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, annot_removed)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, annot_removed)),
6335 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6336 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__OBJECT,
6337 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1,
6338 EV_TYPE_ANNOTATION(ev_annotation_get_type()));
6339 signals[SIGNAL_LAYERS_CHANGED] = g_signal_new ("layers-changed",
6340 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6341 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6342 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, layers_changed)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, layers_changed)),
6343 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6344 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__VOID,
6345 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 0,
6346 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))));
6347 signals[SIGNAL_MOVE_CURSOR] = g_signal_new ("move-cursor",
6348 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6349 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6350 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (EvViewClass, move_cursor)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(EvViewClass, move_cursor)),
6351 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6352 ev_view_marshal_BOOLEAN__ENUM_INT_BOOLEAN,
6353 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), 3,
6354 GTK_TYPE_MOVEMENT_STEP(gtk_movement_step_get_type ()),
6355 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))),
6356 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))));
6357 signals[SIGNAL_CURSOR_MOVED] = g_signal_new ("cursor-moved",
6358 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (object_class)(((GTypeClass*) (object_class))->g_type),
6359 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6360 0,
6361 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6362 ev_view_marshal_VOID__INT_INT,
6363 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 2,
6364 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))),
6365 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))));
6366
6367 binding_set = gtk_binding_set_by_class (class);
6368
6369 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Left0xff51, 0, GTK_MOVEMENT_VISUAL_POSITIONS, -1);
6370 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Right0xff53, 0, GTK_MOVEMENT_VISUAL_POSITIONS, 1);
6371 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Left0xff51, GDK_CONTROL_MASK, GTK_MOVEMENT_WORDS, -1);
6372 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Right0xff53, GDK_CONTROL_MASK, GTK_MOVEMENT_WORDS, 1);
6373 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Up0xff52, 0, GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES, -1);
6374 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Down0xff54, 0, GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES, 1);
6375 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Home0xff50, 0, GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINE_ENDS, -1);
6376 add_move_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_End0xff57, 0, GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINE_ENDS, 1);
6377
6378 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Left0xff51, 0, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_BACKWARD, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
6379 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Right0xff53, 0, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_FORWARD, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
6380 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Left0xff51, GDK_MOD1_MASK, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_DOWN, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
6381 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Right0xff53, GDK_MOD1_MASK, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_UP, GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL);
