6382 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Up0xff52, 0, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_BACKWARD, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
6383 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Down0xff54, 0, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_FORWARD, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
6384 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Up0xff52, GDK_MOD1_MASK, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_DOWN, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
6385 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Down0xff54, GDK_MOD1_MASK, GTK_SCROLL_STEP_UP, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
6386 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Page_Up0xff55, 0, GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
6387 add_scroll_binding_keypad (binding_set, GDK_KEY_Page_Down0xff56, 0, GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);

6412 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, GDK_KEY_BackSpace0xff08, 0, "scroll", 2,
6413 GTK_TYPE_SCROLL_TYPE(gtk_scroll_type_get_type ()), GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD,
6414 GTK_TYPE_ORIENTATION(gtk_orientation_get_type ()), GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
6415 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, GDK_KEY_BackSpace0xff08, GDK_SHIFT_MASK, "scroll", 2,
6416 GTK_TYPE_SCROLL_TYPE(gtk_scroll_type_get_type ()), GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD,
6417 GTK_TYPE_ORIENTATION(gtk_orientation_get_type ()), GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
6418}
6419
6420static void
6421on_notify_scale_factor (EvView *view,
6422 GParamSpec *pspec)
6423{
6424 if (view->document)
6425 view_update_range_and_current_page (view);
6426}
6427
6428static void
6429zoom_gesture_begin_cb (GtkGesture *gesture,
6430 GdkEventSequence *sequence,
6431 EvView *view)
6432{
6433 view->prev_zoom_gesture_scale = 1;
6434}
6435
6436static void
6437zoom_gesture_scale_changed_cb (GtkGestureZoom *gesture,
6438 gdouble scale,
6439 EvView *view)
6440{
6441 gdouble factor;
6442
6443 view->drag_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
6444 view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
6445
6446 factor = scale - view->prev_zoom_gesture_scale + 1;
6447 view->prev_zoom_gesture_scale = scale;
6448 ev_document_model_set_sizing_mode (view->model, EV_SIZING_FREE);
6449
6450 gtk_gesture_get_bounding_box_center (GTK_GESTURE (gesture)((((GtkGesture*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*)
((gesture)), ((gtk_gesture_get_type ())))))), &view->zoom_center_x, &view->zoom_center_y);
6451
6452 if ((factor < 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_out (view)) ||
6453 (factor >= 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_in (view)))
6454 ev_view_zoom (view, factor);
6455}
6456
6457static void
6458ev_view_init (EvView *view)
6459{
6460 GtkStyleContext *context;
6461
6462 gtk_widget_set_can_focus (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), TRUE(!(0)));
6463 gtk_widget_set_has_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), TRUE(!(0)));
6464 gtk_widget_set_redraw_on_allocate (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), FALSE(0));
6465
6466 context = gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6467 gtk_style_context_add_class (context, "content-view");
6468 gtk_style_context_add_class (context, "view");
6469
6470 gtk_widget_set_events (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))),
6471 GDK_TOUCH_MASK |
6472 GDK_EXPOSURE_MASK |
6473 GDK_BUTTON_PRESS_MASK |
6474 GDK_BUTTON_RELEASE_MASK |
6475 GDK_SCROLL_MASK |
6476 GDK_SMOOTH_SCROLL_MASK |
6477 GDK_KEY_PRESS_MASK |
6478 GDK_POINTER_MOTION_MASK |
6479 GDK_POINTER_MOTION_HINT_MASK |
6480 GDK_ENTER_NOTIFY_MASK |
6481 GDK_LEAVE_NOTIFY_MASK);
6482
6483 view->start_page = -1;
6484 view->end_page = -1;
6485 view->spacing = 5;
6486 view->scale = 1.0;
6487 view->current_page = 0;
6488 view->pressed_button = -1;
6489 view->cursor = EV_VIEW_CURSOR_NORMAL;
6490 view->drag_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
6491 view->scroll_info.autoscrolling = FALSE(0);
6492 view->selection_info.selections = NULL((void*)0);
6493 view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE(0);
6494 view->continuous = TRUE(!(0));
6495 view->dual_even_left = TRUE(!(0));
6496 view->fullscreen = FALSE(0);
6497 view->sizing_mode = EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH;
6498 view->page_layout = EV_PAGE_LAYOUT_SINGLE;
6499 view->pending_scroll = SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION;
6500 view->jump_to_find_result = TRUE(!(0));
6501#ifdef ENABLE_SYNCTEX1
6502 view->highlight_find_results = FALSE(0);
6503#endif
6504 view->caret_enabled = FALSE(0);
6505 view->cursor_page = 0;
6506 view->zoom_center_x = -1;
6507 view->zoom_center_y = -1;
6508
6509 g_signal_connect (view, "notify::scale-factor",g_signal_connect_data ((view), ("notify::scale-factor"), (((GCallback
) (on_notify_scale_factor))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
6510 G_CALLBACK (on_notify_scale_factor), NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((view), ("notify::scale-factor"), (((GCallback
) (on_notify_scale_factor))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
6511
6512 view->zoom_gesture = gtk_gesture_zoom_new (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6513 gtk_event_controller_set_propagation_phase (GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER (view->zoom_gesture)((((GtkEventController*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance
*) ((view->zoom_gesture)), ((gtk_event_controller_get_type
())))))),
6514 GTK_PHASE_CAPTURE);
6515
6516 g_signal_connect (view->zoom_gesture, "begin",g_signal_connect_data ((view->zoom_gesture), ("begin"), ((
(GCallback) (zoom_gesture_begin_cb))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
6517 G_CALLBACK (zoom_gesture_begin_cb), view)g_signal_connect_data ((view->zoom_gesture), ("begin"), ((
(GCallback) (zoom_gesture_begin_cb))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
6518 g_signal_connect (view->zoom_gesture, "scale-changed",g_signal_connect_data ((view->zoom_gesture), ("scale-changed"
), (((GCallback) (zoom_gesture_scale_changed_cb))), (view), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
6519 G_CALLBACK (zoom_gesture_scale_changed_cb), view)g_signal_connect_data ((view->zoom_gesture), ("scale-changed"
), (((GCallback) (zoom_gesture_scale_changed_cb))), (view), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
6520}
6521
6522/*** Callbacks ***/
6523
6524static void
6525ev_view_change_page (EvView *view,
6526 gint new_page)
6527{
6528 gint x, y;
6529
6530 view->current_page = new_page;
6531 view->pending_scroll = SCROLL_TO_PAGE_POSITION;
6532
6533 ev_view_set_loading (view, FALSE(0));
6534
6535 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &x, &y);
6536 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
6537
6538 gtk_widget_queue_resize (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6539}
6540
6541static void
6542job_finished_cb (EvPixbufCache *pixbuf_cache,
6543 cairo_region_t *region,
6544 EvView *view)
6545{
6546 if (region) {
6547 gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))), region, TRUE(!(0)));
6548 } else {
6549 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6550 }
6551}
6552
6553static void
6554ev_view_page_changed_cb (EvDocumentModel *model,
6555 gint old_page,
6556 gint new_page,
6557 EvView *view)
6558{
6559 if (!view->document)
6560 return;
6561
6562 if (view->current_page != new_page) {
6563 ev_view_change_page (view, new_page);
6564 } else {
6565 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6566 }
6567
6568 view->find_result = 0;
6569}
6570
6571static void
6572on_adjustment_value_changed (GtkAdjustment *adjustment,
6573 EvView *view)
6574{
6575 GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))));
6576 int dx = 0, dy = 0;
6577 gint x, y;
6578 gint value;
6579 GList *l;
6580
6581 if (!gtk_widget_get_realized (widget))
6582 return;
6583
6584 if (view->hadjustment) {
6585 value = (gint) gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
6586 dx = view->scroll_x - value;
6587 view->scroll_x = value;
6588 } else {
6589 view->scroll_x = 0;
6590 }
6591
6592 if (view->vadjustment) {
6593 value = (gint) gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
6594 dy = view->scroll_y - value;
6595 view->scroll_y = value;
6596 } else {
6597 view->scroll_y = 0;
6598 }
6599
6600 for (l = view->children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
6601 EvViewChild *child = (EvViewChild *)l->data;
6602
6603 child->x += dx;
6604 child->y += dy;
6605 if (gtk_widget_get_visible (child->widget) && gtk_widget_get_visible (widget))
6606 gtk_widget_queue_resize (widget);
6607 }
6608
6609 for (l = view->window_children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)((l) ? (((GList *)(l))->next) : ((void*)0))) {
6610 EvViewWindowChild *child;
6611
6612 child = (EvViewWindowChild *)l->data;
6613
6614 ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, child->x + dx, child->y + dy);
6615 }
6616
6617 if (view->pending_resize) {
6618 gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
6619 } else {
6620 gdk_window_scroll (gtk_widget_get_window (widget), dx, dy);
6621 }
6622
6623 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
6624 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
6625
6626 if (view->document)
6627 view_update_range_and_current_page (view);
6628}
6629
6630GtkWidget*
6631ev_view_new (void)
6632{
6633 GtkWidget *view;
6634
6635 view = g_object_new (EV_TYPE_VIEW(ev_view_get_type ()), NULL((void*)0));
6636
6637 return view;
6638}
6639
6640static void
6641setup_caches (EvView *view)
6642{
6643 gboolean inverted_colors;
6644
6645 view->height_to_page_cache = ev_view_get_height_to_page_cache (view);
32
←
Calling 'ev_view_get_height_to_page_cache'
→
6646 view->pixbuf_cache = ev_pixbuf_cache_new (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), view->model, view->pixbuf_cache_size);
6647 view->page_cache = ev_page_cache_new (view->document);
6648
6649 ev_page_cache_set_flags (view->page_cache,
6650 ev_page_cache_get_flags (view->page_cache) |
6651 EV_PAGE_DATA_INCLUDE_TEXT_LAYOUT |
6652 EV_PAGE_DATA_INCLUDE_TEXT |
6653 EV_PAGE_DATA_INCLUDE_TEXT_ATTRS |
6654 EV_PAGE_DATA_INCLUDE_TEXT_LOG_ATTRS);
6655
6656 inverted_colors = ev_document_model_get_inverted_colors (view->model);
6657 ev_pixbuf_cache_set_inverted_colors (view->pixbuf_cache, inverted_colors);
6658 g_signal_connect (view->pixbuf_cache, "job-finished", G_CALLBACK (job_finished_cb), view)g_signal_connect_data ((view->pixbuf_cache), ("job-finished"
), (((GCallback) (job_finished_cb))), (view), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
6659}
6660
6661static void
6662clear_caches (EvView *view)
6663{
6664 if (view->pixbuf_cache) {
6665 g_object_unref (view->pixbuf_cache);
6666 view->pixbuf_cache = NULL((void*)0);
6667 }
6668
6669 if (view->page_cache) {
6670 g_object_unref (view->page_cache);
6671 view->page_cache = NULL((void*)0);
6672 }
6673}
6674
6675/**
6676 * ev_view_set_page_cache_size:
6677 * @view:
6678 * @cache_size:
6679 *
6680 * Sets the maximum size in bytes that will be used to cache
6681 * rendered pages. Use 0 to disable caching rendered pages.
6682 *
6683 * Note that this limit doesn't affect the current visible page range,
6684 * which will always be rendered. In order to limit the total memory used
6685 * you have to use ev_document_model_set_max_scale() too.
6686 *
6687 */
6688void
6689ev_view_set_page_cache_size (EvView *view,
6690 gsize cache_size)
6691{
6692 if (view->pixbuf_cache_size == cache_size)
6693 return;
6694
6695 view->pixbuf_cache_size = cache_size;
6696 if (view->pixbuf_cache)
6697 ev_pixbuf_cache_set_max_size (view->pixbuf_cache, cache_size);
6698}
6699
6700void
6701ev_view_set_loading (EvView *view,
6702 gboolean loading)
6703{
6704 if (view->loading == loading)
6705 return;
6706
6707 view->loading = loading;
6708 g_object_notify (G_OBJECT (view)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
view)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))), "is-loading");
6709}
6710
6711gboolean
6712ev_view_is_loading (EvView *view)
6713{
6714 return view->loading;
6715}
6716
6717static gboolean
6718ev_view_autoscroll_cb (EvView *view)
6719{
6720 gdouble speed, value;
6721
6722 /* If the user stops autoscrolling, autoscrolling will be
6723 * set to false but the timeout will continue; stop the timeout: */
6724 if (!view->scroll_info.autoscrolling) {
6725 view->scroll_info.timeout_id = 0;
6726 return FALSE(0);
6727 }
6728
6729 /* Replace 100 with your speed of choice: The lower the faster.
6730 * Replace 3 with another speed of choice: The higher, the faster it accelerated
6731 * based on the distance of the starting point from the mouse
6732 * (All also effected by the timeout interval of this callback) */
6733
6734 if (view->scroll_info.start_y > view->scroll_info.last_y)
6735 speed = -pow ((((gdouble)view->scroll_info.start_y - view->scroll_info.last_y) / 100), 3);
6736 else
6737 speed = pow ((((gdouble)view->scroll_info.last_y - view->scroll_info.start_y) / 100), 3);
6738
6739 value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
6740 value = CLAMP (value + speed, 0,(((value + speed) > (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment
) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->vadjustment)) : (((value + speed) < (0)) ? (0) :
(value + speed)))
6741 gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) -(((value + speed) > (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment
) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->vadjustment)) : (((value + speed) < (0)) ? (0) :
(value + speed)))
6742 gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment))(((value + speed) > (gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment
) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment))) ? (
gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) - gtk_adjustment_get_page_size
(view->vadjustment)) : (((value + speed) < (0)) ? (0) :
(value + speed)));
6743 gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment, value);
6744
6745 return TRUE(!(0));
6746
6747}
6748
6749void
6750ev_view_autoscroll_start (EvView *view)
6751{
6752 gint x, y;
6753
6754 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return; } } while (0);
6755
6756 if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling)
6757 return;
6758
6759 view->scroll_info.autoscrolling = TRUE(!(0));
6760 view->scroll_info.timeout_id =
6761 g_timeout_add (20, (GSourceFunc)ev_view_autoscroll_cb,
6762 view);
6763
6764 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &x, &y);
6765 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
6766}
6767
6768void
6769ev_view_autoscroll_stop (EvView *view)
6770{
6771 gint x, y;
6772
6773 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return; } } while (0);
6774
6775 if (!view->scroll_info.autoscrolling)
6776 return;
6777
6778 view->scroll_info.autoscrolling = FALSE(0);
6779 if (view->scroll_info.timeout_id) {
6780 g_source_remove (view->scroll_info.timeout_id);
6781 view->scroll_info.timeout_id = 0;
6782 }
6783
6784 ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &x, &y);
6785 ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
6786}
6787
6788static void
6789ev_view_document_changed_cb (EvDocumentModel *model,
6790 GParamSpec *pspec,
6791 EvView *view)
6792{
6793 EvDocument *document = ev_document_model_get_document (model);
6794
6795 if (document != view->document) {

→

6820 } else {

(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6823 }
6824 }
6825}
6826
6827static void
6828ev_view_rotation_changed_cb (EvDocumentModel *model,
6829 GParamSpec *pspec,
6830 EvView *view)
6831{
6832 gint rotation = ev_document_model_get_rotation (model);
6833
6834 view->rotation = rotation;
6835
6836 if (view->pixbuf_cache) {
6837 ev_pixbuf_cache_clear (view->pixbuf_cache);
6838 if (!ev_document_is_page_size_uniform (view->document))
6839 view->pending_scroll = SCROLL_TO_PAGE_POSITION;
6840 gtk_widget_queue_resize (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6841 }
6842
6843 ev_view_remove_all (view);
6844
6845 if (rotation != 0)
6846 clear_selection (view);
6847}
6848
6849static void
6850ev_view_inverted_colors_changed_cb (EvDocumentModel *model,
6851 GParamSpec *pspec,
6852 EvView *view)
6853{
6854 if (view->pixbuf_cache) {
6855 gboolean inverted_colors;
6856
6857 inverted_colors = ev_document_model_get_inverted_colors (model);
6858 ev_pixbuf_cache_set_inverted_colors (view->pixbuf_cache, inverted_colors);
6859 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6860 }
6861}
6862
6863static void
6864ev_view_sizing_mode_changed_cb (EvDocumentModel *model,
6865 GParamSpec *pspec,
6866 EvView *view)
6867{
6868 EvSizingMode mode = ev_document_model_get_sizing_mode (model);
6869
6870 view->sizing_mode = mode;
6871 if (mode != EV_SIZING_FREE)
6872 gtk_widget_queue_resize (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6873}

6877 GParamSpec *pspec,

6879{

6881
6882 view->page_layout = layout;
6883
6884 view->pending_scroll = SCROLL_TO_PAGE_POSITION;
6885 gtk_widget_queue_resize (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6886
6887 /* FIXME: if we're keeping the pixbuf cache around, we should extend the
6888 * preload_cache_size to be 2 if dual_page is set.
6889 */
6890}
6891
6892#define EPSILON0.0000001 0.0000001
6893static void
6894ev_view_scale_changed_cb (EvDocumentModel *model,
6895 GParamSpec *pspec,
6896 EvView *view)
6897{
6898 gdouble scale = ev_document_model_get_scale (model);
6899
6900 if (ABS (view->scale - scale)(((view->scale - scale) < 0) ? -(view->scale - scale
) : (view->scale - scale)) < EPSILON0.0000001)
6901 return;
6902
6903 view->scale = scale;
6904
6905 view->pending_resize = TRUE(!(0));
6906 if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FREE)
6907 gtk_widget_queue_resize (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
6908}

(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));

7008
7009static void
7010ev_view_reload_page (EvView *view,
7011 gint page,
7012 cairo_region_t *region)
7013{
7014 ev_pixbuf_cache_reload_page (view->pixbuf_cache,
7015 region,
7016 page,
7017 view->rotation,
7018 view->scale);
7019}
7020
7021void
7022ev_view_reload (EvView *view)
7023{
7024 ev_pixbuf_cache_clear (view->pixbuf_cache);
7025 view_update_range_and_current_page (view);
7026}
7027
7028/*** Zoom and sizing mode ***/
7029
7030gboolean
7031ev_view_can_zoom_in (EvView *view)
7032{
7033 return view->scale * ZOOM_IN_FACTOR1.2 <= ev_document_model_get_max_scale (view->model);
7034}
7035
7036gboolean
7037ev_view_can_zoom_out (EvView *view)
7038{
7039 return view->scale * ZOOM_OUT_FACTOR(1.0/1.2) >= ev_document_model_get_min_scale (view->model);
7040}
7041
7042void
7043ev_view_zoom (EvView *view, gdouble factor)
7044{
7045 gdouble scale;
7046
7047 g_return_if_fail (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FREE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FREE) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FREE"); return
; } } while (0);
7048
7049 view->pending_scroll = SCROLL_TO_CENTER;
7050 scale = ev_document_model_get_scale (view->model) * factor;
7051 ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, scale);
7052}
7053
7054void
7055ev_view_zoom_in (EvView *view)
7056{
7057 ev_view_zoom (view, ZOOM_IN_FACTOR1.2);
7058}
7059
7060void
7061ev_view_zoom_out (EvView *view)
7062{
7063 ev_view_zoom (view, ZOOM_OUT_FACTOR(1.0/1.2));
7064}
7065
7066void
7067ev_view_zoom_reset (EvView *view)
7068{
7069 g_return_if_fail (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FREE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FREE) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FREE"); return
; } } while (0);
7070 ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, 1.2);
7071}
7072
7073static double
7074zoom_for_size_fit_width (gdouble doc_width,
7075 gdouble doc_height,
7076 int target_width,
7077 int target_height)
7078{
7079 return (double)target_width / doc_width;
7080}
7081
7082static double
7083zoom_for_size_fit_height (gdouble doc_width,
7084 gdouble doc_height,
7085 int target_width,
7086 int target_height)
7087{
7088 return (double)target_height / doc_height;
7089}
7090
7091static double
7092zoom_for_size_fit_page (gdouble doc_width,
7093 gdouble doc_height,
7094 int target_width,
7095 int target_height)
7096{
7097 double w_scale;
7098 double h_scale;
7099
7100 w_scale = (double)target_width / doc_width;
7101 h_scale = (double)target_height / doc_height;
7102
7103 return MIN (w_scale, h_scale)(((w_scale) < (h_scale)) ? (w_scale) : (h_scale));
7104}
7105
7106static double
7107zoom_for_size_automatic (GdkScreen *screen,
7108 gdouble doc_width,
7109 gdouble doc_height,
7110 int target_width,
7111 int target_height)
7112{
7113 double fit_width_scale;
7114 double scale;
7115
7116 fit_width_scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, target_width, target_height);
7117
7118 if (doc_height < doc_width) {
7119 double fit_height_scale;
7120
7121 fit_height_scale = zoom_for_size_fit_height (doc_width, doc_height, target_width, target_height);
7122 scale = MIN (fit_width_scale, fit_height_scale)(((fit_width_scale) < (fit_height_scale)) ? (fit_width_scale
) : (fit_height_scale));
7123 } else {
7124 double actual_scale, resolution;
7125
7126 resolution = gdk_screen_get_resolution (screen);
7127 if (resolution == -1) {
7128 GdkDisplay *display = gdk_screen_get_display (screen);
7129 GdkMonitor *monitor = gdk_display_get_primary_monitor (display);
7130 resolution = ev_document_misc_get_monitor_dpi (monitor);
7131 }
7132 actual_scale = resolution / 72.0;
7133 scale = MIN (fit_width_scale, actual_scale)(((fit_width_scale) < (actual_scale)) ? (fit_width_scale) :
(actual_scale));
7134 }
7135
7136 return scale;
7137}
7138
7139static void
7140ev_view_zoom_for_size_continuous_and_dual_page (EvView *view,
7141 int width,
7142 int height)
7143{
7144 gdouble doc_width, doc_height;
7145 GtkBorder border;
7146 gdouble scale;
7147 gint sb_size;
7148
7149 ev_document_get_max_page_size (view->document, &doc_width, &doc_height);
7150 if (view->rotation == 90 || view->rotation == 270) {
7151 gdouble tmp;
7152
7153 tmp = doc_width;
7154 doc_width = doc_height;
7155 doc_height = tmp;
7156 }
7157
7158 compute_border (view, &border);
7159
7160 doc_width *= 2;
7161 width -= (2 * (border.left + border.right) + 3 * view->spacing);
7162 height -= (border.top + border.bottom + 2 * view->spacing - 1);
7163
7164 sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7165
7166 switch (view->sizing_mode) {
7167 case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
7168 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7169 break;
7170 case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
7171 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7172 break;
7173 case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
7174 scale = zoom_for_size_automatic (gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
7175 doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7176 break;
7177 default:
7178 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 7178
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
7179 }
7180
7181 ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, scale);
7182}
7183
7184static void
7185ev_view_zoom_for_size_continuous (EvView *view,
7186 int width,
7187 int height)
7188{
7189 gdouble doc_width, doc_height;
7190 GtkBorder border;
7191 gdouble scale;
7192 gint sb_size;
7193
7194 ev_document_get_max_page_size (view->document, &doc_width, &doc_height);
7195 if (view->rotation == 90 || view->rotation == 270) {
7196 gdouble tmp;
7197
7198 tmp = doc_width;
7199 doc_width = doc_height;
7200 doc_height = tmp;
7201 }
7202
7203 compute_border (view, &border);
7204
7205 width -= (border.left + border.right + 2 * view->spacing);
7206 height -= (border.top + border.bottom + 2 * view->spacing - 1);
7207
7208 sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7209
7210 switch (view->sizing_mode) {
7211 case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
7212 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7213 break;
7214 case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
7215 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7216 break;
7217 case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
7218 scale = zoom_for_size_automatic (gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
7219 doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7220 break;
7221 default:
7222 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 7222
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
7223 }
7224
7225 ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, scale);
7226}
7227
7228static void
7229ev_view_zoom_for_size_dual_page (EvView *view,
7230 int width,
7231 int height)
7232{
7233 GtkBorder border;
7234 gdouble doc_width, doc_height;
7235 gdouble scale;
7236 gint other_page;
7237 gint sb_size;
7238
7239 other_page = view->current_page ^ 1;
7240
7241 /* Find the largest of the two. */
7242 get_doc_page_size (view, view->current_page, &doc_width, &doc_height);
7243 if (other_page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)) {
7244 gdouble width_2, height_2;
7245
7246 get_doc_page_size (view, other_page, &width_2, &height_2);
7247 if (width_2 > doc_width)
7248 doc_width = width_2;
7249 if (height_2 > doc_height)
7250 doc_height = height_2;
7251 }
7252 compute_border (view, &border);
7253
7254 doc_width = doc_width * 2;
7255 width -= ((border.left + border.right)* 2 + 3 * view->spacing);
7256 height -= (border.top + border.bottom + 2 * view->spacing);
7257
7258 switch (view->sizing_mode) {
7259 case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
7260 sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7261 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7262 break;
7263 case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
7264 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width, height);
7265 break;
7266 case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
7267 sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7268 scale = zoom_for_size_automatic (gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
7269 doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7270 break;
7271 default:
7272 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 7272
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
7273 }
7274
7275 ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, scale);
7276}
7277
7278static void
7279ev_view_zoom_for_size_single_page (EvView *view,
7280 int width,
7281 int height)
7282{
7283 gdouble doc_width, doc_height;
7284 GtkBorder border;
7285 gdouble scale;
7286 gint sb_size;
7287
7288 get_doc_page_size (view, view->current_page, &doc_width, &doc_height);
7289
7290 /* Get an approximate border */
7291 compute_border (view, &border);
7292
7293 width -= (border.left + border.right + 2 * view->spacing);
7294 height -= (border.top + border.bottom + 2 * view->spacing);
7295
7296 switch (view->sizing_mode) {
7297 case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
7298 sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7299 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7300 break;
7301 case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
7302 scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width, height);
7303 break;
7304 case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
7305 sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
7306 scale = zoom_for_size_automatic (gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
7307 doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7308 break;
7309 default:
7310 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 7310
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
7311 }
7312
7313 ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, scale);
7314}
7315
7316static void
7317ev_view_zoom_for_size (EvView *view,
7318 int width,
7319 int height)
7320{
7321 gboolean dual_page;
7322
7323 g_return_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return; } } while (0);
7324 g_return_if_fail (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH ||do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH || view->
sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC
) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_
; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", (
(const char*) (__func__)), "view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC"
); return; } } while (0)
7325 view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE ||do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH || view->
sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC
) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_
; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", (
(const char*) (__func__)), "view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC"
); return; } } while (0)
7326 view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH || view->
sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC
) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_
; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", (
(const char*) (__func__)), "view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE || view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC"
); return; } } while (0);
7327 g_return_if_fail (width >= 0)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (width >= 0) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_
= 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
("AtrilView", ((const char*) (__func__)), "width >= 0"); return
; } } while (0);
7328 g_return_if_fail (height >= 0)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (height >= 0) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_
= 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
("AtrilView", ((const char*) (__func__)), "height >= 0");
return; } } while (0);
7329
7330 if (view->document == NULL((void*)0))
7331 return;
7332
7333 dual_page = is_dual_page (view, NULL((void*)0));
7334 if (view->continuous && dual_page)
7335 ev_view_zoom_for_size_continuous_and_dual_page (view, width, height);
7336 else if (view->continuous)
7337 ev_view_zoom_for_size_continuous (view, width, height);
7338 else if (dual_page)
7339 ev_view_zoom_for_size_dual_page (view, width, height);
7340 else
7341 ev_view_zoom_for_size_single_page (view, width, height);
7342}
7343
7344static gboolean
7345ev_view_page_fits (EvView *view,
7346 GtkOrientation orientation)
7347{
7348 GtkRequisition requisition;
7349 GtkAllocation allocation;
7350 double size;
7351
7352 if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE)
7353 return TRUE(!(0));
7354
7355 if (orientation == GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL &&
7356 (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH))
7357 return TRUE(!(0));
7358
7359 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &allocation);
7360 ev_view_size_request (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))), &requisition);
7361
7362 if (orientation == GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL) {
7363 if (requisition.width == 1) {
7364 size = 1.0;
7365 } else {
7366 if (allocation.width > 0.0)
7367 size = (double) requisition.width / allocation.width;
7368 else
7369 size = 1.0;
7370 }
7371 } else {
7372 if (requisition.height == 1) {
7373 size = 1.0;
7374 } else {
7375 if (allocation.height > 0.0)
7376 size = (double) requisition.height / allocation.height;
7377 else
7378 size = 1.0;
7379 }
7380 }
7381
7382 return size <= 1.0;
7383}
7384
7385/*** Find ***/
7386static gint
7387ev_view_find_get_n_results (EvView *view, gint page)
7388{
7389 return view->find_pages ? g_list_length (view->find_pages[page]) : 0;
7390}
7391
7392static EvRectangle *
7393ev_view_find_get_result (EvView *view, gint page, gint result)
7394{
7395 return view->find_pages ? (EvRectangle *) g_list_nth_data (view->find_pages[page], result) : NULL((void*)0);
7396}
7397
7398static void
7399jump_to_find_result (EvView *view)
7400{
7401 gint n_results;
7402 gint page = view->current_page;
7403
7404 n_results = ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, page);
7405
7406 if (n_results > 0 && view->find_result < n_results) {
7407 EvRectangle *rect;
7408 GdkRectangle view_rect;
7409
7410 rect = ev_view_find_get_result (view, page, view->find_result);
7411 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, rect, &view_rect);
7412 ensure_rectangle_is_visible (view, &view_rect);
7413 if (view->caret_enabled && view->rotation == 0)
7414 position_caret_cursor_at_doc_point (view, page, rect->x1, rect->y1);
7415
7416 view->jump_to_find_result = FALSE(0);
7417 }
7418}
7419
7420/**
7421 * jump_to_find_page:
7422 * @view: #EvView instance
7423 * @direction: Direction to look
7424 * @shift: Shift from current page
7425 *
7426 * Jumps to the first page that has occurences of searched word.
7427 * Uses a direction where to look and a shift from current page.
7428 *
7429 */
7430static void
7431jump_to_find_page (EvView *view, EvViewFindDirection direction, gint shift)
7432{
7433 int n_pages, i;
7434
7435 n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
7436
7437 for (i = 0; i < n_pages; i++) {
7438 int page;
7439
7440 if (direction == EV_VIEW_FIND_NEXT)
7441 page = view->current_page + i;
7442 else
7443 page = view->current_page - i;
7444 page += shift;
7445
7446 if (page >= n_pages) {
7447 page = page - n_pages;
7448 } else if (page < 0)
7449 page = page + n_pages;
7450
7451 if (ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, page) > 0) {
7452 ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, page);
7453 break;
7454 }
7455 }
7456}
7457
7458/**
7459 * ev_view_find_changed: (skip)
7460 * @view: an #EvView
7461 * @results: the results as returned by ev_job_find_get_results()
7462 * @page: page index
7463 */
7464void
7465ev_view_find_changed (EvView *view, GList **results, gint page)
7466{
7467 g_return_if_fail (view->current_page >= 0)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (view->current_page >= 0) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else
_g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
("AtrilView", ((const char*) (__func__)), "view->current_page >= 0"
); return; } } while (0);
7468 view->find_pages = results;
7469
7470 if (view->jump_to_find_result == TRUE(!(0))) {
7471 jump_to_find_page (view, EV_VIEW_FIND_NEXT, 0);
7472 jump_to_find_result (view);
7473 }
7474
7475 if (view->current_page == page)
7476 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
7477}
7478
7479void
7480ev_view_find_next (EvView *view)
7481{
7482 gint n_results;
7483
7484 n_results = ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, view->current_page);
7485 view->find_result++;
7486
7487 if (view->find_result >= n_results) {
7488 view->find_result = 0;
7489 jump_to_find_page (view, EV_VIEW_FIND_NEXT, 1);
7490 jump_to_find_result (view);
7491 } else {
7492 jump_to_find_result (view);
7493 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
7494 }
7495}
7496
7497void
7498ev_view_find_previous (EvView *view)
7499{
7500 view->find_result--;
7501
7502 if (view->find_result < 0) {
7503 jump_to_find_page (view, EV_VIEW_FIND_PREV, -1);
7504 view->find_result = MAX (0, ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, view->current_page) - 1)(((0) > (ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, view->current_page
) - 1)) ? (0) : (ev_view_find_get_n_results (view, view->current_page
) - 1));
7505 jump_to_find_result (view);
7506 } else {
7507 jump_to_find_result (view);
7508 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
7509 }
7510}
7511
7512void
7513ev_view_find_search_changed (EvView *view)
7514{
7515 /* search string has changed, focus on new search result */
7516 view->jump_to_find_result = TRUE(!(0));
7517 view->find_pages = NULL((void*)0);
7518}
7519
7520void
7521ev_view_find_set_highlight_search (EvView *view, gboolean value)
7522{
7523 view->highlight_find_results = value;
7524 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
7525}
7526
7527void
7528ev_view_find_cancel (EvView *view)
7529{
7530 view->find_pages = NULL((void*)0);
7531}
7532
7533#ifdef ENABLE_SYNCTEX1
7534/*** Synctex ***/
7535void
7536ev_view_highlight_forward_search (EvView *view,
7537 EvSourceLink *link)
7538{
7539 EvMapping *mapping;
7540 gint page;
7541 GdkRectangle view_rect;
7542
7543 if (!ev_document_has_synctex (view->document))
7544 return;
7545
7546 mapping = ev_document_synctex_forward_search (view->document, link);
7547 if (!mapping)
7548 return;
7549
7550 if (view->synctex_result)
7551 g_free (view->synctex_result);
7552 view->synctex_result = mapping;
7553
7554 page = GPOINTER_TO_INT (mapping->data)((gint) (glong) (mapping->data));
7555 ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, page);
7556
7557 _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, &mapping->area, &view_rect);
7558 ensure_rectangle_is_visible (view, &view_rect);
7559 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
7560}
7561#endif /* ENABLE_SYNCTEX */
7562
7563/*** Selections ***/
7564static gboolean
7565gdk_rectangle_point_in (GdkRectangle *rectangle,
7566 GdkPoint *point)
7567{
7568 return rectangle->x <= point->x &&
7569 rectangle->y <= point->y &&
7570 point->x < rectangle->x + rectangle->width &&
7571 point->y < rectangle->y + rectangle->height;
7572}
7573
7574static inline gboolean
7575gdk_point_equal (GdkPoint *a,
7576 GdkPoint *b)
7577{
7578 return a->x == b->x && a->y == b->y;
7579}
7580
7581static gboolean
7582get_selection_page_range (EvView *view,
7583 EvSelectionStyle style,
7584 GdkPoint *start,
7585 GdkPoint *stop,
7586 gint *first_page,
7587 gint *last_page)
7588{
7589 gint start_page, end_page;
7590 gint first, last;
7591 gint i, n_pages;
7592
7593 n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
7594
7595 if (gdk_point_equal (start, stop)) {
7596 start_page = view->start_page;
7597 end_page = view->end_page;
7598 } else if (view->continuous) {
7599 start_page = 0;
7600 end_page = n_pages - 1;
7601 } else if (is_dual_page (view, NULL((void*)0))) {
7602 start_page = view->start_page;
7603 end_page = view->end_page;
7604 } else {
7605 start_page = view->current_page;
7606 end_page = view->current_page;
7607 }
7608
7609 first = -1;
7610 last = -1;
7611 for (i = start_page; i <= end_page; i++) {
7612 GdkRectangle page_area;
7613 GtkBorder border;
7614
7615 ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
7616 page_area.x -= border.left;
7617 page_area.y -= border.top;
7618 page_area.width += border.left + border.right;
7619 page_area.height += border.top + border.bottom;
7620 if (gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, start) ||
7621 gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, stop)) {
7622 if (first == -1)
7623 first = i;
7624 last = i;
7625 }
7626 }
7627
7628 if (first != -1 && last != -1) {
7629 *first_page = first;
7630 *last_page = last;
7631
7632 return TRUE(!(0));
7633 }
7634
7635 return FALSE(0);
7636}
7637
7638static GList *
7639compute_new_selection (EvView *view,
7640 EvSelectionStyle style,
7641 GdkPoint *start,
7642 GdkPoint *stop)
7643{
7644 int i, first, last;
7645 GList *list = NULL((void*)0);
7646
7647 /* First figure out the range of pages the selection affects. */
7648 if (!get_selection_page_range (view, style, start, stop, &first, &last))
7649 return list;
7650
7651 /* Now create a list of EvViewSelection's for the affected
7652 * pages. This could be an empty list, a list of just one
7653 * page or a number of pages.*/
7654 for (i = first; i <= last; i++) {
7655 EvViewSelection *selection;
7656 GdkRectangle page_area;
7657 GtkBorder border;
7658 GdkPoint *point;
7659 gdouble width, height;
7660
7661 get_doc_page_size (view, i, &width, &height);
7662
7663 selection = g_slice_new0 (EvViewSelection)((EvViewSelection*) g_slice_alloc0 (sizeof (EvViewSelection))
);
7664 selection->page = i;
7665 selection->style = style;
7666 selection->rect.x1 = selection->rect.y1 = 0;
7667 selection->rect.x2 = width;
7668 selection->rect.y2 = height;
7669
7670 ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
7671 page_area.x -= border.left;
7672 page_area.y -= border.top;
7673 page_area.width += border.left + border.right;
7674 page_area.height += border.top + border.bottom;
7675
7676 if (gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, start))
7677 point = start;
7678 else
7679 point = stop;
7680
7681 if (i == first) {
7682 _ev_view_transform_view_point_to_doc_point (view, point, &page_area,
7683 &selection->rect.x1,
7684 &selection->rect.y1);
7685 selection->rect.x1 = MAX (selection->rect.x1 - border.left, 0)(((selection->rect.x1 - border.left) > (0)) ? (selection
->rect.x1 - border.left) : (0));
7686 selection->rect.y1 = MAX (selection->rect.y1 - border.top, 0)(((selection->rect.y1 - border.top) > (0)) ? (selection
->rect.y1 - border.top) : (0));
7687 }
7688
7689 /* If the selection is contained within just one page,
7690 * make sure we don't write 'start' into both points
7691 * in selection->rect. */
7692 if (first == last)
7693 point = stop;
7694
7695 if (i == last) {
7696 _ev_view_transform_view_point_to_doc_point (view, point, &page_area,
7697 &selection->rect.x2,
7698 &selection->rect.y2);
7699 selection->rect.x2 = MAX (selection->rect.x2 - border.right, 0)(((selection->rect.x2 - border.right) > (0)) ? (selection
->rect.x2 - border.right) : (0));
7700 selection->rect.y2 = MAX (selection->rect.y2 - border.bottom, 0)(((selection->rect.y2 - border.bottom) > (0)) ? (selection
->rect.y2 - border.bottom) : (0));
7701 }
7702
7703 list = g_list_prepend (list, selection);
7704 }
7705
7706 return g_list_reverse (list);
7707}
7708
7709/* This function takes the newly calculated list, and figures out which regions
7710 * have changed. It then queues a redraw approporiately.
7711 */
7712static void
7713merge_selection_region (EvView *view,
7714 GList *new_list)
7715{
7716 GList *old_list;
7717 GList *new_list_ptr, *old_list_ptr;
7718
7719 /* Update the selection */
7720 old_list = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_list (view->pixbuf_cache);
7721 g_list_free_full (view->selection_info.selections, (GDestroyNotify)selection_free);
7722 view->selection_info.selections = new_list;
7723 ev_pixbuf_cache_set_selection_list (view->pixbuf_cache, new_list);
7724 g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_SELECTION_CHANGED], 0, NULL((void*)0));
7725
7726 new_list_ptr = new_list;
7727 old_list_ptr = old_list;
7728
7729 while (new_list_ptr || old_list_ptr) {
7730 EvViewSelection *old_sel, *new_sel;
7731 int cur_page;
7732 cairo_region_t *region = NULL((void*)0);
7733
7734 new_sel = (new_list_ptr) ? (new_list_ptr->data) : NULL((void*)0);
7735 old_sel = (old_list_ptr) ? (old_list_ptr->data) : NULL((void*)0);
7736
7737 /* Assume that the lists are in order, and we run through them
7738 * comparing them, one page at a time. We come out with the
7739 * first page we see. */
7740 if (new_sel && old_sel) {
7741 if (new_sel->page < old_sel->page) {
7742 new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
7743 old_sel = NULL((void*)0);
7744 } else if (new_sel->page > old_sel->page) {
7745 old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
7746 new_sel = NULL((void*)0);
7747 } else {
7748 new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
7749 old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
7750 }
7751 } else if (new_sel) {
7752 new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
7753 } else if (old_sel) {
7754 old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
7755 }
7756
7757 g_assert (new_sel || old_sel)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if (new_sel || old_sel) _g_boolean_var_ = 1; else _g_boolean_var_
= 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 7757, ((const char*) (__func__)),
"new_sel || old_sel"); } while (0);
7758
7759 /* is the page we're looking at on the screen?*/
7760 cur_page = new_sel ? new_sel->page : old_sel->page;
7761 if (cur_page < view->start_page || cur_page > view->end_page)
7762 continue;
7763
7764 /* seed the cache with a new page. We are going to need the new
7765 * region too. */
7766 if (new_sel) {
7767 cairo_region_t *tmp_region;
7768
7769 tmp_region = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_region (view->pixbuf_cache,
7770 cur_page,
7771 view->scale);
7772 if (tmp_region)
7773 new_sel->covered_region = cairo_region_reference (tmp_region);
7774 }
7775
7776 /* Now we figure out what needs redrawing */
7777 if (old_sel && new_sel) {
7778 if (old_sel->covered_region && new_sel->covered_region) {
7779 if (!cairo_region_equal (old_sel->covered_region, new_sel->covered_region)) {
7780 /* Anything that was previously or currently selected may
7781 * have changed */
7782 region = cairo_region_copy (old_sel->covered_region);
7783 cairo_region_union (region, new_sel->covered_region);
7784 }
7785 } else if (old_sel->covered_region) {
7786 region = cairo_region_reference (old_sel->covered_region);
7787 } else if (new_sel->covered_region) {
7788 region = cairo_region_reference (new_sel->covered_region);
7789 }
7790 } else if (old_sel && !new_sel) {
7791 if (old_sel->covered_region && !cairo_region_is_empty (old_sel->covered_region)) {
7792 region = cairo_region_reference (old_sel->covered_region);
7793 }
7794 } else if (!old_sel && new_sel) {
7795 if (new_sel->covered_region && !cairo_region_is_empty (new_sel->covered_region)) {
7796 region = cairo_region_reference (new_sel->covered_region);
7797 }
7798 } else {
7799 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr ("AtrilView", "ev-view.c", 7799
, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
7800 }
7801
7802 /* Redraw the damaged region! */
7803 if (region) {
7804 GdkRectangle page_area;
7805 GtkBorder border;
7806 cairo_region_t *damage_region;
7807 gint i, n_rects;
7808
7809 ev_view_get_page_extents (view, cur_page, &page_area, &border);
7810
7811 damage_region = cairo_region_create ();
7812 /* Translate the region and grow it 2 pixels because for some zoom levels
7813 * the area actually drawn by cairo is larger than the selected region, due
7814 * to rounding errors or pixel alignment.
7815 */
7816 n_rects = cairo_region_num_rectangles (region);
7817 for (i = 0; i < n_rects; i++) {
7818 cairo_rectangle_int_t rect;
7819
7820 cairo_region_get_rectangle (region, i, &rect);
7821 rect.x += page_area.x + border.left - view->scroll_x - 2;
7822 rect.y += page_area.y + border.top - view->scroll_y - 2;
7823 rect.width += 4;
7824 rect.height += 4;
7825 cairo_region_union_rectangle (damage_region, &rect);
7826 }
7827 cairo_region_destroy (region);
7828
7829 gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ()))))))),
7830 damage_region, TRUE(!(0)));
7831 cairo_region_destroy (damage_region);
7832 }
7833 }
7834
7835 ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
7836
7837 /* Free the old list, now that we're done with it. */
7838 g_list_free_full (old_list, (GDestroyNotify)selection_free);
7839}
7840
7841static void
7842compute_selections (EvView *view,
7843 EvSelectionStyle style,
7844 GdkPoint *start,
7845 GdkPoint *stop)
7846{
7847 merge_selection_region (view, compute_new_selection (view, style, start, stop));
7848}
7849
7850/* Free's the selection. It's up to the caller to queue redraws if needed.
7851 */
7852static void
7853selection_free (EvViewSelection *selection)
7854{
7855 if (selection->covered_region)
7856 cairo_region_destroy (selection->covered_region);
7857 g_slice_free (EvViewSelection, selection)do { if (1) g_slice_free1 (sizeof (EvViewSelection), (selection
)); else (void) ((EvViewSelection*) 0 == (selection)); } while
(0);
7858}
7859
7860static void
7861clear_selection (EvView *view)
7862{
7863 merge_selection_region (view, NULL((void*)0));
7864}
7865
7866void
7867ev_view_select_all (EvView *view)
7868{
7869 GList *selections = NULL((void*)0);
7870 int n_pages, i;
7871
7872 /* Disable selection on rotated pages for the 0.4.0 series */
7873 if (view->rotation != 0)
7874 return;
7875
7876 n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
7877 for (i = 0; i < n_pages; i++) {
7878 gdouble width, height;
7879 EvViewSelection *selection;
7880
7881 get_doc_page_size (view, i, &width, &height);
7882
7883 selection = g_slice_new0 (EvViewSelection)((EvViewSelection*) g_slice_alloc0 (sizeof (EvViewSelection))
);
7884 selection->page = i;
7885 selection->style = EV_SELECTION_STYLE_GLYPH;
7886 selection->rect.x1 = selection->rect.y1 = 0;
7887 selection->rect.x2 = width;
7888 selection->rect.y2 = height;
7889
7890 selections = g_list_prepend (selections, selection);
7891 }
7892
7893 merge_selection_region (view, g_list_reverse (selections));
7894}
7895
7896gboolean
7897ev_view_get_has_selection (EvView *view)
7898{
7899 return view->selection_info.selections != NULL((void*)0);
7900}
7901
7902void
7903_ev_view_clear_selection (EvView *view)
7904{
7905 clear_selection (view);
7906}
7907
7908void
7909_ev_view_set_selection (EvView *view,
7910 GdkPoint *start_point,
7911 GdkPoint *end_point)
7912{
7913 compute_selections (view, EV_SELECTION_STYLE_GLYPH, start_point, end_point);
7914}
7915
7916static char *
7917get_selected_text (EvView *view)
7918{
7919 GString *text;
7920 GList *l;
7921 gchar *normalized_text;
7922
7923 text = g_string_new (NULL((void*)0));
7924
7925 ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
7926
7927 for (l = view->selection_info.selections; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next) {
7928 EvViewSelection *selection = (EvViewSelection *)l->data;
7929 EvPage *page;
7930 gchar *tmp;
7931
7932 page = ev_document_get_page (view->document, selection->page);
7933 tmp = ev_selection_get_selected_text (EV_SELECTION (view->document)((((EvSelection*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*
) ((view->document)), ((ev_selection_get_type ())))))),
7934 page, selection->style,
7935 &(selection->rect));
7936 g_object_unref (page);
7937 g_string_append (text, tmp);
7938 g_free (tmp);
7939 }
7940
7941 ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
7942
7943 normalized_text = g_utf8_normalize (text->str, text->len, G_NORMALIZE_NFKC);
7944 g_string_free (text, TRUE(!(0)));
7945 return normalized_text;
7946}
7947
7948static void
7949ev_view_clipboard_copy (EvView *view,
7950 const gchar *text)
7951{
7952 GtkClipboard *clipboard;
7953
7954 clipboard = gtk_widget_get_clipboard (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))),
7955 GDK_SELECTION_CLIPBOARD((GdkAtom)((gpointer) (gulong) (69))));
7956 gtk_clipboard_set_text (clipboard, text, -1);
7957}
7958
7959void
7960ev_view_copy (EvView *ev_view)
7961{
7962 char *text;
7963
7964 if (!EV_IS_SELECTION (ev_view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(ev_view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_selection_get_type (
))); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))))
7965 return;
7966
7967 text = get_selected_text (ev_view);
7968 ev_view_clipboard_copy (ev_view, text);
7969 g_free (text);
7970}
7971
7972static void
7973ev_view_primary_get_cb (GtkClipboard *clipboard,
7974 GtkSelectionData *selection_data,
7975 guint info,
7976 gpointer data)
7977{
7978 EvView *ev_view = EV_VIEW (data)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((data
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
7979
7980 if (ev_view->link_selected) {
7981 gtk_selection_data_set_text (selection_data,
7982 ev_link_action_get_uri (ev_view->link_selected),
7983 -1);
7984 } else if (EV_IS_SELECTION (ev_view->document)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(ev_view->document)); GType __t = ((ev_selection_get_type (
))); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))) &&
7985 ev_view->selection_info.selections) {
7986 gchar *text;
7987
7988 text = get_selected_text (ev_view);
7989 if (text) {
7990 gtk_selection_data_set_text (selection_data, text, -1);
7991 g_free (text);
7992 }
7993 }
7994}
7995
7996static void
7997ev_view_primary_clear_cb (GtkClipboard *clipboard,
7998 gpointer data)
7999{
8000 EvView *view = EV_VIEW (data)((((EvView*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((data
)), ((ev_view_get_type ()))))));
8001
8002 clear_selection (view);
8003 clear_link_selected (view);
8004}
8005
8006static void
8007ev_view_update_primary_selection (EvView *ev_view)
8008{
8009 GtkClipboard *clipboard;
8010
8011 clipboard = gtk_widget_get_clipboard (GTK_WIDGET (ev_view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(ev_view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))),
8012 GDK_SELECTION_PRIMARY((GdkAtom)((gpointer) (gulong) (1))));
8013
8014 if (ev_view->selection_info.selections || ev_view->link_selected) {
8015 GtkTargetList *target_list;
8016 GtkTargetEntry *targets;
8017 int n_targets;
8018
8019 target_list = gtk_target_list_new (NULL((void*)0), 0);
8020 gtk_target_list_add_text_targets (target_list, 0);
8021 targets = gtk_target_table_new_from_list (target_list, &n_targets);
8022 gtk_target_list_unref (target_list);
8023
8024 if (!gtk_clipboard_set_with_owner (clipboard,
8025 targets, n_targets,
8026 ev_view_primary_get_cb,
8027 ev_view_primary_clear_cb,
8028 G_OBJECT (ev_view)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
ev_view)), (((GType) ((20) << (2))))))))))
8029 ev_view_primary_clear_cb (clipboard, ev_view);
8030
8031 gtk_target_table_free (targets, n_targets);
8032 } else {
8033 if (gtk_clipboard_get_owner (clipboard) == G_OBJECT (ev_view)((((GObject*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) ((
ev_view)), (((GType) ((20) << (2)))))))))
8034 gtk_clipboard_clear (clipboard);
8035 }
8036}
8037
8038static void
8039clear_link_selected (EvView *view)
8040{
8041 if (view->link_selected) {
8042 g_object_unref (view->link_selected);
8043 view->link_selected = NULL((void*)0);
8044 }
8045}
8046
8047void
8048ev_view_copy_link_address (EvView *view,
8049 EvLinkAction *action)
8050{
8051 clear_link_selected (view);
8052
8053 ev_view_clipboard_copy (view, ev_link_action_get_uri (action));
8054
8055 view->link_selected = g_object_ref (action);
8056 ev_view_update_primary_selection (view);
8057}
8058
8059/*** Cursor operations ***/
8060static void
8061ev_view_set_cursor (EvView *view, EvViewCursor new_cursor)
8062{
8063 GdkDisplay *display;
8064 GdkCursor *cursor = NULL((void*)0);
8065 GtkWidget *widget;
8066 GdkWindow *bin_window;
8067
8068 if (view->cursor == new_cursor) {
8069 return;
8070 }
8071
8072 view->cursor = new_cursor;
8073
8074 bin_window = gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
8075 widget = gtk_widget_get_toplevel (GTK_WIDGET (view)((((GtkWidget*) g_type_check_instance_cast ((GTypeInstance*) (
(view)), ((gtk_widget_get_type ())))))));
8076 display = gtk_widget_get_display (widget);
8077 cursor = ev_view_cursor_new (display, new_cursor);
8078 gdk_window_set_cursor (bin_window, cursor);
8079 gdk_display_flush (display);
8080 if (cursor)
8081 g_object_unref (cursor);
8082}
8083
8084void
8085ev_view_hide_cursor (EvView *view)
8086{
8087 ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_HIDDEN);
8088}
8089
8090void
8091ev_view_show_cursor (EvView *view)
8092{
8093 ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_NORMAL);
8094}
8095
8096gboolean
8097ev_view_next_page (EvView *view)
8098{
8099 gint next_page;
8100
8101 g_return_val_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return ((0)); } } while (
0);
8102
8103 next_page = go_to_next_page (view, view->current_page);
8104 if (next_page == -1)
8105 return FALSE(0);
8106
8107 ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, next_page);
8108
8109 return TRUE(!(0));
8110}
8111
8112gboolean
8113ev_view_previous_page (EvView *view)
8114{
8115 gint prev_page;
8116
8117 g_return_val_if_fail (EV_IS_VIEW (view), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((view)); GType __t = ((ev_view_get_type ())); gboolean __r
; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_ = 0; _g_boolean_var_; }), 1))) { }
else { g_return_if_fail_warning ("AtrilView", ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EV_IS_VIEW (view)"); return ((0)); } } while (
0);
8118
8119 prev_page = go_to_previous_page (view, view->current_page);
8120 if (prev_page == -1)
8121 return FALSE(0);
8122
8123 ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, prev_page);
8124
8125 return TRUE(!(0));
8126}
8127
8128/**
8129 * ev_view_disconnect_handlers
8130 * @view: #EvView instance
8131 *
8132 * Disconnect all signal handlers from the model, to ensure error free operation of the webview,
8133 * we have an equivalent function for the webview.
8134 */
8135void
8136ev_view_disconnect_handlers(EvView *view)
8137{
8138 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(view->model,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_rotation_changed_cb))), (view))
8139 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_rotation_changed_cb),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_rotation_changed_cb))), (view))
8140 view)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_rotation_changed_cb))), (view));
8141 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(view->model,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_inverted_colors_changed_cb))), (view
))
8142 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_inverted_colors_changed_cb),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_inverted_colors_changed_cb))), (view
))
8143 view)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_inverted_colors_changed_cb))), (view
));
8144 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(view->model,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_sizing_mode_changed_cb))), (view))
8145 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_sizing_mode_changed_cb),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_sizing_mode_changed_cb))), (view))
8146 view)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_sizing_mode_changed_cb))), (view));
8147 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(view->model,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (ev_view_page_layout_changed_cb))), (view))
8148 G_CALLBACK (ev_view_page_layout_changed_cb),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((view->model), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
